Title: Contour De Force Mini Blush
Body:
Transform your skin from forgettable to flawless with a pretty pop of colour from the SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Blush. Light and infinitely blendable, a kiss of this blush on your cheeks is all it takes to make you look radiant with minimal effort. The long-wearing colour is effortlessly buildable, which makes it easy to create the entire spectrum of looks from sheer to dramatic. Its lightweight, velvet formulation glides on smoothly to give natural looking colour that lasts the entire day. Swipe it on and score that perfectly flushed look within seconds!

Available In:

01 Peach Peak (Soft Peach Pink)

You really can’t go wrong with Peach Peak – a universally flattering soft peach pink tint that will warm up your cheeks with just the slightest hint of natural radiant colour.

02 Pink Pinnacle (Deep Rose)

If you’ve ever dreamed of having 50 shades of rose on your cheeks and then some… consider your wish granted with the deep rose shade that is Pink Pinnacle.

03 Mauve Marvel (Plum)
You just can't miss the sublime Goddess-like plum flush of colour on your cheeks that Mauve Marvel provides.-1000

04 Salmon Superstar (Warm Peach) 
Nothing shouts out 'Oh! So beautiful' louder than the unrivalled warm peach shade of Salmon Superstar.

05 Coral Climax (Bright Coral)
Relish the heavenly flush of colour on your cheeks with the utterly bright coral hue of Coral Climax.

 

How To Apply: You will need next to nothing of this richly pigmented blush to get a nice wash of colour. Tap the brush into the blush pan and flick the stem of the brush to knock off any excess product. Lightly tap on your cheek, and then blend using soft swirling motions.

Benefits:The light-as-air SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Blush blends like a dream into the apples of your cheeks for a seamless wash of vivid, long-lasting colour. This product is dermatologically tested & approved and 100% safe for your skin.

Additional Details: The SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Blush comes in 5 pretty shades viz., 01 Peach Pink, 02 Pink Pinnacle, 03 Mauve Marvel, 04 Salmon Superstar, 05 Coral Climax. This product is free from parabens, D5, oil, mineral oil and nano-ingredients.

Size: 4 gm.

List Of Ingredients: Talc, Mica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethiconol Stearate, Magnesium Myristate, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Aluminum Hydroxide, May Contain: Iron Oxides, Red 7 Lake, Yellow 5 Lake, Ultramarines, Blue 1 Lake.

MRP: 349 (incl. all taxes)

Formulated in Italy

Company Name: Regi India Cosmetics Pvt Ltd.

Company Address: C-08, Sara Ind Estate, Vill-Rampur, Selaqui, Dehradun 248197, Uttarakhand.

Title: Matte Attack Transferproof Lipstick
Body:
The secret to having a fabulous matte pout in the spotlight has been revealed!

For red carpet ready, 'ooh là là’ lips, look no further than our SUGAR Matte Attack Transferproof Lipsticks that are now available in new highly pigmented bold and edgy shades to give your lips some love and a oomph factor with every swipe.

Yes, our collection just got bigger! These luscious SUGAR matte lipstick shades not only impart vivid, transferproof colour but also hydrate and protect lips with a delicate blend of nourishing ingredients such as jojoba oil. Rich in pigments and featuring a lightweight creamy, non-drying formula, the Matte Attack Transferproof Lipstick’s formula comes second-to-none and its varied bold lip colours are sure to match every mood, occasion or outfit. The sleek matte lipstick formula glides on effortlessly, giving your pout a beautiful opaque finish and stays put all day so you never have to worry about bleeding, cracking or reapplying.

Moreover, to ensure precise application, it is designed with a slim bullet that allows for the most perfectly defined lip line and cupid's bow.

01 Boldplay (Cardinal Pink) – Complements your romantic smile like no other!

02 Red Zeppelin (Chilli Red) – Suits the rock star in you, perfectly!

03 The Grandberries (Dark Berry) – For that dark, bold, and beautiful look!

04 Maroon Vibe (Dark Red) – A stunning red shade that screams: Smooth. Perfect as a party wear!

05 Tan Halen (Chocolate Brown) – Lets your pout make everyone go nuts.

06 Spring Crimson (Crimson Red) – A crowd fave to watch out for!

07 Peachwood Mac (Peach Pink) – A shade you can rock, anytime, anywhere.

08 Daft Pink (Deep Pink) – For those who’ve mastered their groove. A great fit for both date nights and office wear!

09 The Peach Boys (Medium Tone Peach shade with hints of red and brown) – Makes the world dance to your tunes.

10 Depeach Mode (Peach) – A light shade that takes the spotlight, centre-stage!

11 The Blush Eyed Peas (Pink Blush Nude) - A shade for everyday hustlin’

12 The Pinks (Cotton Candy/Bubblegum Pink) - A date night must!

13 Plums N Roses (Deep Reddish Plum) - For a perfect statement-making pout

14 Caffeine Bandit (Chocolate Brown) - A true classic that never goes outta style

15 Salmon Republic (Deep Salmon Pink) - An all mood & occasion approved shade

16 Pinkin Park (Strawberry Pink/Magenta) - A shade meant to take the spotlight

17 Grateful Red (Bluish Red/Cool-toned Red) - Perfect to bring out your inner diva

So, what are you waiting for! Take your pick from these creamy and dreamy matte lipstick shades that’ll have your lips feeling as gorgeous as they look -

Key Features

- These creamy matte lipsticks are water-resistant, transferproof, non-drying and do not budge for hours together

-  The lipstick colours are rich in pigment, offer more colour intensity and a lightweight feel

-  Enriched with jojoba oil that hydrates and nourishes lips and also helps reduce dryness, flaking

- The formula dries quickly to give you an opaque matte finish and leaves behind a smooth, silky feel

- Available in 17 vividly pigmented shades

- Sleek, slim bullet design with fuss-free retractable mechanism allows for easy and precise application on the go

- Cruelty-free, vegetarian formula; Paraben and fragrance free

Net Weight: 2gms

MRP: 699 (incl. all taxes)

Country of Origin: Taiwan

Company Name: Ann Ann Inc.,

Company Address: No. 7 Lane 256, Yen Ho St., Yong Kang Dist, Tainan City, Taiwan - 71082

How to apply

 - Start by exfoliating your lips with a nourishing lip scrub followed by a hydrating lip balm to ensure your lips don’t feel dry.

- Choose your favourite lip colour from the brilliant SUGAR matte lipstick shades, gently twist from bottom and apply.

- The ultra-slim bullet lipstick design ensures precise and proper application of the matte formula with even coverage.

Best paired with:

- SUGAR Matte Attack Transferproof Lipstick can be complemented with a similar hued lip liner to make your lips feel much defined, plump and full.

- Complete your look by opting for an intense black eyeliner and richly pigmented nude eyeshadow shade.

- Finish off your look with a swipe of highlighter on your cheeks and add a little towards the inside of your eyes to make them pop!

Commonly asked questions

Q. What is the lipstick formula like?
A. The formula of this SUGAR longwear, transferproof lipstick is super matte!

Q. Is this matte lipstick drying?
A. The lipstick formula packed with high colour pigments is intensely creamy and non-drying. Moreover, it is enriched with jojoba oil - known for its hydrating and nourishing properties.

Q. Does this lipstick take time to set?
A. This non-transfer lip colour will go opaque matte and sets on your lips super quick!

Q. Does it feel heavy on the lips?
A. No, the SUGAR Matte Attack Transferproof lipstick formula is super lightweight and offers a smooth and silky feel.

Q. Is this lipstick safe to use on lips?
A. Yes absolutely! The formula is free from parabens, fragrance and the product is cruelty-free and vegetarian.

Title: Matte As Hell Crayon Lipstick
Body:
Glam up your pout with our beautifully bold, incredibly long-lasting and gorgeously vivid SUGAR Matte As Hell Crayon Lipstick. This lipstick lives up to its title by providing the most smooth, silky soft matte finish!

Blending confident colour with desirable comfort, Matte As Hell Crayon lipstick is highly-pigmented formula that glides on comfortable and instantly reveals a weightless veil of high pigment. Enriched with lip-conditioning ingredients, this long-wear crayon lipstick keeps your lips soft and hydrated whilst helping ward against dryness. What makes it even better? It comes with a high-quality sharpener that helps keep the tip of the crayon ultra-precise for an effortless swipe every single time! Read more details about the Crayon Lipstick Sharpener here!

Indulge in 36 gorgeous matte lipstick shades, that can also be layered and mixed to create a totally unique lip look and add an extra dose of ‘oomph’ to your pout!

Benefits:
  • Ultra-matte lip crayons that super pigmented and long-lasting
  • Its soft texture ensures a smooth application with every swipe
  • The 36 vivid shades deliver a silky matte finish that’ll rock any occasion or mood
  • Cruelty-free, 100% vegetarian; Free from mineral oil, parabens and paraffin
  • Slim bullet design allows for easy and precise application on the go
  • Dermatologically-tested and approved; 100% safe for your skin
  • Comes with a high-quality sharpener
  • Available in 32 flattering shades that work perfect for Indian skin tones

Net Weight: 2.8gms

Maximum Retail Price: Rs. 799.00 (incl. all taxes)

Country of Origin: Germany
Company Name: Schwan Cosmetics Germany Gmbh & Co.Kg
Company Address: Schwanweg 1, 90562 Heroldsberg - (Germany)

How to Apply
  • Apply this lipstick in the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your mouth with the precise tip
  • Use the wider side of the crayon to fill in lips, all in a swipe!
  • Enjoy a perfect pout for up to 10 hours
Ingredients
Isododecane, Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Synthetic Wax, Distarch Phosphate, Polybutene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Methicone, Dimethylimidazolidinone Rice Starch, Glyceryl Caprylate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Silica, Isoceteth - 10 May Contain: CI 77491, 77492, 77499, 77891, 77019.

Commonly Asked Questions
Q. How is the finish of this crayon lipstick?
A. This crayon lipstick is super matte yet comfortable on lips and gives you full coverage!

Q. How long does the lipstick stay?
A. Our highly pigmented creamy matte lipstick offers high-impact colour and stays good for up to 10 to 12 hours!

Q. Are there any nude lipstick shades available for everyday wear?
A. Absolutely! Matte As Hell Lipsticks are available in 36 stunning shades and there is a lip shade for each skin tone and occasion. Our best nude lipsticks from the collection are 20 Buffy Summers (Mid-tone Warm Nude) which suits fair to medium skin tone better, 19 Emma Woodhouse (Earthy Brown) which looks gorgeous on most Indian skin tones and 18 Rosalind (Nude Rose) and 07 Viola (Mauve Nude) shades that suit medium to dusky skin tone better! Find your best nude lipstick match here.

Title: Contour De Force Face Palette
Body:
Looking runway ready in just a few swipes is not a distant dream anymore!

Presenting our SUGAR Contour De Force Face Palette that houses a power-packed trio of a matte bronzer, a radiant highlighter and a dreamy blush. Step up your beauty game by experimenting with the highlighter to stay in the spotlight, the bronzer for an enhanced tan and the contour for a defined, sculpted look.

The travel-friendly size of this makeup face palette is exactly what you’d love to stash in your clutch to create any look in a flash. Moreover, these universally flattering shades in both matte and shimmer finishes suit every skin tone from light to deep. Its silky soft, pigmented formula blends seamlessly into skin for flawless perfection you always dreamed of. And thanks to the built-in mirror, getting ready while on-the-go using this SUGAR face palette seems truly effortless.

Don’t think twice, take your pick from the below SUGAR palette variants!

Available In:

01 SUBTLE SUMMIT

- This subtle-themed face palette contains one soft, cool shade each of highlighter, bronzer and blush, carefully picked to create a moderate look. It is all you need when you wish to keep things simple yet fabulous.  
- (L to R): Taupe Topper (Cool-toned Brown Bronzer), Champagne Champion (Champagne Gold Highlighter) and Peach Peak (Soft Peach Pink Blush)

02 VIVID VICTORY

- This vibrant-themed face palette contains one bold shade each of highlighter, bronzer and blush that sums up beautifully for a dramatic look. If your plans demand you to be vibrant and glamorous, this is what you want.
- (L to R): Woody Wonder (Warm Brown Bronzer), Gold Glory (Golden Bronze Highlighter) and Pink Pinnacle (Deep Rose Blush)

03 FIERCE FEAT

- 'Fierce Feat' shade variant is a great option for medium to deeper complexions. This stunning palette includes one peppy shade of blush, a cool-toned bronzer and a gorgeous shade of highlighter, handpicked and curated to create jaw-dropping looks.
- (L to R): Royal Rose (Rosey Taupe Highlighter), Coral Climax (Bright Coral Blush), Caramel Captain (Cool-toned Chestnut Brown Bronzer).

Key Features:

- Versatile makeup palette with pigment-packed highlighter, bronzer and blush powder
- The finely-milled, buildable powders blend effortlessly for a flawless finish that is lightweight and smooth
- This product is free from parabens, D5, mineral oil and nano-ingredients
- Dermatologically tested and approved; 100% safe for your skin
- The SUGAR Contour De Force Face Palette comes in three striking options viz. 01 Subtle Summit, 02 Vivid Victory and 03 Fierce Feat. Choose the shade that matches your skin tone

MRP: 799 (incl. all taxes)

Net Weight: 12gms.

Formulated in Italy

Company Name: Regi India Cosmetics Pvt Ltd.

Company Address: C-08, Sara Ind Estate, Vill-Rampur, Selaqui, Dehradun 248197, Uttarakhand.

How to apply

- Create a flawless base using a pore minimizing face primer and foundation. Set the base using a compact powder.

- For a brilliant contour, apply bronzer under cheekbones, along the sides of the nose and around the borders of the face (hairline, temples and jawline).

- Create a stunning flush of colour on the cheeks by applying the blush from the palette to the apples of your cheeks. Dab a little on the bridge of the nose and chin for an extra rush of sweetness!

- Achieve a stellar glow by applying highlighter on your cheekbones, on the brow bone and the inner corner of your eyes.

Commonly Asked Questions

Q. Does this palette suit all skin tones?
A. The SUGAR Contour De Force Face Palette comes in three variants to suit different skin tones and undertones. 01 SUBTLE SUMMIT (for fair skin tones), 02 VIVID VICTORY (for medium skin tones) and 03 FIERCE FEAT (for deeper skin tones). Pick your favorite and flaunt flawlessness!

Q. Where do I apply the bronzer?
A. Bronzer is all about adding warmth and dimension to your skin. The best way to apply a bronzing powder is blending the product softly around your hairline, cheekbones and bridge of your nose to flatter your face shape while adding overall warmth and depth to your complexion. Finish the look with a fine highlighting powder to set and add maximum dimension.

Q. Are the powders paraben free?
A. Absolutely! The palette is free from parabens, D5, mineral oil and nano-ingredients.

Q. Are the powders pigmented?
A. Yes, the colour payoff is great and lasts for hours!

Q. Is the formula safe to use?
A. This product is dermatologically tested & approved; it's 100% safe for your skin.

Title: Kohl Of Honour Intense Kajal - 01 Black Out (Black)
Body:
Ready to elevate your eye game to many notches above the ordinary? Step up to the world of extreme-wear, waterproof kajals with the SUGAR Kohl Of Honour Intense Kajal. Smudge and transfer-resistant, this breakthrough formula glides on smoothly for flawless, precise application and stays put for 12 straight hours. Ergonomically designed in an easy-to-use twist-up form, this wonder product delivers pigment-rich, high-impact colour that will fill your eyes with all the definition and drama you’ve ever known!

01 Black Out (Black) – Every look intensified!

Additional Details: This product does not require an additional sharpener.

Net Weight: 0.25 gm.

SUGAR Kohl Of Honour Intense Kajal Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Iron Oxides, Polybutene, Synthetic Bees Wax, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Black 2, Paraffin, Talc, Carnauba Wax, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tocopherol, Sunflower Seed Oil & BHT.

Maximum Retail Price: Rs. 249 (incl. all taxes)

Country of Origin: India

Company Name: Viva Cosmetics

Company Address: A/19 G4 Happy Valley, Nr Tikujiniwadi, Manpada, Thane W - 400610

How to apply

Swivel up and glide on SUGAR Kohl Of Honour Intense Kajal, using short strokes. Build the desired shape on your lash line for a more controlled and smoother application. This best kajal can be applied to your upper/lower lash line and also on the waterline - you can even blend over the entire eyelid for a smokey eye makeup effect. Re-cap securely after use. This formula is designed to be used alone or over eyeshadow.

Best paired with:

Go in with an eyeshadow palette and create a simple, smokey look. Add loads of lengthening mascara for long lashes. Finish with a pop of highlighter, pink blush to the cheeks, and a nude lipstick.

Benefits

SUGAR Kohl of Honour Intense Kajal is powered by:
- Ultra-creamy texture (Glides on smoothly)
- 100% opacity (Super rich colour pay off)
- 12-hour stay power (No touch ups needed)

Commonly asked questions

Q. How long will it last on my eyes?
A. Up to 12 hours.

Q. Is it waterproof?
A. SUGAR Kohl Of Honour Intense Kajal is waterproof, smudgeproof, and even crackproof.

Q. Is the product paraben free?
A. Yes.

Q. How many shades does it come in?
A. In 6 fabulous shades.

Q. Does it come with a sharpener?
A. The product doesn't need a sharpener. It comes in a twist-up packaging.

Title: Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick
Body:
If you've ever lusted for a "one-coat wonder" product for your lips, your search ends here. Get a full-blooded burst of pigment with just a single swipe of the SUGAR Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick that will stay the day and right up till the night! This kiss-proof lipstick is available in 52 shades online that will make it difficult to choose from - the question is, are you ready to commit to a stunning long lasting lipstick?

  • 01 Brazen Raisin (Burgundy) - A shade that's as addictive as it is badass!
  • 02 Brink of Pink (Plum Rose) – Lets the smile on your lips speak out loud!
  • 03 Tan Fan (Nude Mauve) - A shade that defines the timeless nude of the 90s.
  • 04 Plum Yum (Muted Plum) – For curating an elegant look that blends the artistic with the stylish.
  • 05 Rust Lust (Red Terracotta) - Makes your pout stand out without a hint of doubt.
  • 06 Tangerine Queen (Orange Coral) - Makes a statement that few will dare to disagree with.
  • 07 Rethink Pink (Fuchsia) - Creates a look that's inimitably beautiful.
  • 08 Wine and Shine (Deep Violet) - A shade that is a vintage classic and an instant hit!
  • 09 Suave Mauve (Mauve) - A time-tested everyday classic!
  • 10 Drop Dead Red (Red) - A showstopper red that will never go out of style.
  • 11 Greige Rage (Greige Rose) - Adds the unexpected with the grunge vibe.
  • 12 Don Fawn (Yellowish Brown) - Keeps lips point for a day that packs in both work and play.
  • 13 Wooed by Nude (Nude Peach) - A shade that will give you a gorgeous yet understated lip.
  • 14 Teak Mystique (Warm Brown) – A shade that’ll find a permanent place in your trousseau and on your lips!
  • 15 Blush Rush (Pale Pink) - For superhero in you who is out to slay all night and all day.
  • 16 Bare Flair (Rose Brown) – A shade that’s irreplaceable for the romantic in you.
  • 17 Fiery Berry (Marsala) – For the pros of mixing subtle with seductive into one heady cocktail of style.
  • 18 Divine Praline (Dusty Burgundy) - A shade that says you're ready to take the world by storm.
  • 19 Jet Set Violet (Magenta Purple) – A shade that defines bold like no other.
  • 20 Cocoa Ammo (Mocha Brown) – A shade that builds the perfect bold, daytime vibe.
  • 21 Aubergine Queen (Blackened Burgundy) – A shade that’s one unapologetic ode to your inner Diva.
  • 22 Mia Sangria (Purple Pink) - Delivers a cocktail of awesome like nothing you've experienced before.
  • 23 Merry Berry (Dark Plum) - Adds a dash of the devious to your daily adventures.
  • 24 Vivid Orchid (Bright Violet) – The perfect pop for the picture-perfect pucker!
  • 25 Very Mulberry (Deep Berry) - This one will put all other trousseau favourites on the backburner.
  • 26 Rose Repose (Peach Pink)- A stunner that lights up a range of looks from classic day to chic night.
  • 27 Brown Crown (Plum Brown) - A shade designed to make your darkest fantasy look plain vanilla.
  • 28 Trusty Rusty (Rust Red) - An outstanding shade that makes heads turn.
  • 29 Scarlet Starlet (Orange Red) - It's classic, it's fiery and it's the best for a sensational pout.
  • 30 Peony Genie (Medium Pink) - A shade that lets you sashay effortlessly from traditional to trendy.
  • 31 Carmine Shine (Metallic Bright Red) - Adds a punch of dazzle to classic red lips
  • 32 Brass Class (Deep Bronze Brown) - A stunner that gleams with elegance and style.
  • 33 Amethyst Twist (Metallic Plum) - This shade is a lavish display of class, power and everything else.
  • 34 Merlot Glow (Metallic Burgundy) - A shade that radiates power and passion.
  • 35 Radiant Currant (Metallic Burnt Red) - This gothic shade casts an aura of glory and envy.
  • 36 Pink Clink (Metallic Rose Gold) - A shade to chase all dull moments away.
  • 37 Hot Apricot (Peachy Nude) - The perfect hue to slay the day with grit and grace.
  • 38 Dose Of Rose (Rosy Mauve) - A beautiful hue that stays true to class and subtlety.
  • 39 Pink Sync (Rosy Magenta) - A shade that brings out the bubbly in you.
  • 40 Fuchsia Fantasia (Fuschia Plum) - This is all you need to stride out and seize the day!
  • 41 Gotta Terracotta (Burnt Orange) - An inimitable shade that draws them to you like a moth to flame.
  • 42 Toast Roast (Deep Reddish Brown) - A shade that lets you be your bomb-ass self and slay the day.
  • 43 Hot Shot (Hot Pink) - This one stays true to its name and makes you strut like one.
  • 44 Preach Peach (Peach Pink) - This gorgeous shade strides between the aura that’s chic and sophisticated.
  • 45 Grape Drape (Deep Mauve with hints of Purple) - This one satisfies all your berry cravings.
  • 46 Rad Red (Orange Toned Red) - A stunner that adds oomph to the usual red lip colour fads.
  • 47 Pink Ink (Deep Pink) - A hue that adds a splash of gorgeous pink on your lips.
  • 48 Violet Bullet (Violet Red) - An exotic colour that draws all the attention.
  • 49 Nude Mood (Brown Nude with pink undertone) - A shade that's enough to set a mood for exotic things.
  • 50 Dandy Candy (Pinkish Red) - This one screams the best lip candy in town.
  • 51 Fine Wine (Burgundy Red) - This shade lets you be the best connoisseur of sophistication.
  • 52 Modern Auburn (Flamenco Red) - This one draws the crowds like none other.

Additional Details: This product is dermatologically tested & approved and 100% safe for your skin.

Net Volume: 4.5 ml.

SUGAR Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick Ingredients: Isododecane, Dimethicone & Isododecane & Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Cyclopentasiloxane & Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propyl Paraben, Propylene Carbonate, Vitamin - E, Fragrance, Approved colours.

Maximum Retail Price: RS. 499.00 – Rs. 549.00 (incl. all taxes)

Country of Origin: India

Company Name: Viva Cosmetics

Company Address: A/19 G4 Happy Valley, Nr Tikujiniwadi, Manpada, Thane W - 400610

How to apply

For precise application, apply the original SUGAR Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick to your bottom lip first and then tend to your upper lip. Since the formula is highly pigmented, we suggest applying the colour to the bottom lip first, pressing your lips together and then filling in your Cupid’s bow. Purse your lips together to enhance shine.

Best paired with:

Before you don your favourite SUGAR Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick shade, prep your lips with a swipe of lip primer that will hold the colour in place longer. Complete your look with a simple winged eyeliner and some eyeshadow makeup to compliment your lips. Finally, apply a touch of shine to the inside corners of your eyes with a touch of the best highlighter, to look picture-perfect!
    Benefits

    SUGAR Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick is powered by powered by:

    - Vitamin E (For nourishment)
    - 52 shades (Super wide range to choose from)
    - Transferproof formula (Won't budge for hours)
    - A cruelty free formula

    Commonly asked questions


    Q. What's the finish like?
    A. Super matte.

    Q. Will it dry my lips?
    A. The product is enriched with Vitamin E for nourishment. To find out why Vitamin E enriched-products are a must-have in your makeup kit, click here

    Q. How many shades does it come in?
    A. SUGAR Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick comes in 52 shades. You're truly spoiled for choice!

    Q. Does it transfer?
    A. Absolutely not! It’s completely non-transferable.

    Q. How pigmented is it?
    A. You'll get super rich pigment in just a single swatch.

Title: Contour De Force Mini Bronzer
Body:
Get an instant sun-kissed glow that lasts!

Your search for a flattering matte bronzer that adds warmth and definition to your face ends here.

Introducing the SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Bronzer in three universally flattering shades that can be used to add warmth, sculpt or give your complexion a long-lasting, healthy glow.
The silky smooth, lightweight and ultra-blendable formula gives an impeccable radiant-matte finish that lasts for hours and accentuates your best features effortlessly. Whether you’re looking for warmth or contouring, trust this one to do it all, flawlessly!

A single swipe is all you need for a rich colour payoff and that all-year-round tanned, healthy glow.

Choose from the shades below:

01 Taupe Topper (Brownish Gray Bronzer with cool undertones) - For a subtle sun-kissed warmth with a lit-from-within glow. A neutral brown shade with taupe undertones that works well for fair complexion.

02 Woody Wonder (Warm Brown Bronzer) - For an illuminating touch of sunny warmth that enhances your natural complexion. Neither too orange or muddy, this earthy brown shade works well for most Indian skin tones. Best suited for medium or olive toned complexion.

03 Caramel Captain (Chestnut Brown) - For an elegant deeper warmth that lets you bask in that post-vacay bronzed look year-round. This chestnut brown shade with the right amount of warm and cool tones to it, works well for deeper skin tones.

Key Features:

- This illuminating, silky smooth formula blends seamlessly and adds a sun-kissed warmth to your skin
- It's super lightweight, easily blendable and is highly pigmented, thereby giving you a pop of radiance in a single swipe
- This formula is so finely milled that it basically melts into the skin, leaving not a trace of chalkiness or any streaks
- Use this matte bronzer to fake a healthy-looking tan or to chisel and shape the face to create the illusion of incredible definition
- This bronzer is free from parabens, D5, mineral oil and nano-ingredients

Net Weight: 4gm

Maximum Retail Price: Rs 399 (incl. all taxes)

Country of Origin: Italy
Company Name: Regi India Cosmetics Pvt Ltd.
Company Address: C-08, Sara Ind Estate, Vill-Rampur, Selaqui, Dehradun 248197, Uttarakhand.

Ingredients
SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Bronzer Ingredients: Talc, Mica, Dimethicone, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Zinc Stearate, Polybutene, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Isopropyl Isostearate, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Oleate, Citric Acid, May Contain: Iron Oxides, Red 7 Lake.

How to Apply
- Tap a makeup brush in bronzer then sweep it along your cheekbones and around your temples and forehead. Apply it to places where the sun typically hits. If you like a sculpted look, you can also run the brush along the edge of your jawline to define it.
- The key to a natural bronzey glow is to blend the product well. Blend in small, gentle circles to diffuse the harsh lines and fade the product for a seamless finish.
- For all-over glow and definition, use whatever product is left on your brush to your nose, chin, and neck.

Best paired with: Bronzer goes on after face makeup (foundation, concealer, setting powder and blush). You can use any type of fluffy brush you like. Our personal preference is a brush with soft, short bristles so that we control the placement. Wear this best buy bronzer over your foundation and concealer. Add a pop of blush and loads of highlighter. Finish with your favourite red crayon lipstick.

Commonly Asked Questions
Q. What is the formula like?
A. This is a soft, smooth matte finish bronzer gives you that just came back from the beach golden glow. And because there’s no shimmer, it works for an all over application or you can simply dust it on where the sun would hit your face.

Q. How do I pick the right bronzer for my skin tone?
A. Decide a shade based on your skin undertone and opt for a bronzer one or two shades darker than your natural skin tone. Women with deep skin tones should try rich, chocolatey-brown bronzer while women with fair to light skin can opt for a rose or peach-colored bronzer. Medium skin tones can experiment with warm shades of coppery brown.

Q. Can I use it to contour?
A. Yes, SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Bronzer can be used for contouring and adding gorgeous warmth to your skin!

Q. Where do I apply the bronzer?
A. Bronzer is all about adding warmth and dimension to your skin. The best way to apply a matte bronzing powder is blending the product softly around your hairline, cheekbones, and bridge of your nose to flatter your face shape while adding overall warmth and depth to your complexion. Finish the look with a fine highlighting powder to set and add maximum dimension.

Q. Is this bronzer formula safe to use on skin?
A. It's absolutely safe to use on all skin types. It is free from parabens, D5, mineral oil and nano-ingredients and is also vegan.

Title: Base Of Glory Pore Minimizing Primer
Body:
A skin-perfecting face primer that gives you a flawless base! Coming in weightless is the SUGAR Base Of Glory Pore Minimizing Primer that goes above and beyond to ensure your face is prepped for perfection. A must-have for a base, this face primer boasts of a satin-smooth texture that helps minimize the appearance of pores, masks fine lines and wrinkles. Its no-block no-clog formula lends a soft-focus matte finish and controls excess oil for a shine-free canvas. Apart from working hard to deliver a crease-free base, this primer also keeps your skin healthy, smooth and protected from sun damage owing to its vitamin E and A richness.

So, what are you waiting for? Make this skin-perfector a part of your daily beauty routine as it sure does work hard to enhance and prolong the look of makeup, long after you’ve ventured outside.

Benefits:
  • A weightless, pore minimizing primer with a no-block no-clog formula
  • Lends a soft-focus satin matte finish and evens out skin
  • Controls shine, minimizes the appearance of pores and hides fine lines and wrinkles
  • Enriched with the goodness of vitamin A and E
  • Cruelty-free and 100% vegan
  • Formulated without parabens and mineral-oil

Maximum Retail Price: Rs.799 (incl. all taxes)

Net Weight: 30ml

Country of Origin: India

Company Name: Cosmic Nutracos Solutions Pvt Ltd

Company Address: Cosmic Nutracos Solutions Pvt. Ltd., Plot 12, Bhatolikalan, PO Baddi District Solan - 173205.

How to Apply
  • Apply a pea-size amount of primer on a clean, moisturized face
  • Using your fingertips massage it into your skin
  • Blend outwards in circular motions.
    Ingredients
    Isoddecane, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cyclopentasiloxane and Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer.

    Commonly Asked Questions
    Q. What does this pore-minimizing face primer do?
    A.     This super light and fresh formula smoothens out pores, blurs fine lines and wrinkles and gives you a smooth base. The no-clog formula refines pores, makes makeup last longer and works well for all skin types!

    Q. Do I have to use it with makeup only?
    A.     Not necessarily. You can wear it under your foundation or use it alone to mattify and minimize shine and oil.

    Q. Do you use a face moisturizer on before primer?
    A.     The purpose of using a moisturizer first on cleansed skin is to lock in moisture and to keep dryness away. We recommend prepping skin well with applying a lightweight-moisturizer or serum and then following it up with Base Of Glory Pore Minimizing Primer. Find our quick guide on how to perfect a soft matte makeup look here!

Title: Arch Arrival Brow Definer
Body:
Your ticket to gorgeous brows!

Whether you like them naturally groomed or strikingly bold, perfecting your brow game is a fine art. With the new SUGAR Arch Arrival Brow Definer, you can now discover the artist in you and score your brow goals in no time.

Bold, bushy, sharp and thin, there’s no brow that the Arch Arrival Brow Definer cannot
work its magic on. Moreover, its sweat and humidity-resistant, waterproof formula
ensures the colour doesn’t slide around through the course of the day and lasts for up
to 12 hours straight. Adding to the awesomeness of this retractable pencil, is the specially-designed triangular slant that gives you both – precise shaping with a pointed tip and generous filling with a flat edge. And with a premium spoolie attached to the other end, no matter how soft or dramatic your arches look, they’ll always be blended and natural.

Your search for your brow weapon of choice ends here – give it a spin today!

Benefits:

  • Easy to use, all-in-one brow tool for easy, on-the-go application
  • Delivers precise, ultra-pigmented colour
  • Super blendable formula
  • Long-lasting 12HR wear
  • Sweat, water-proof and humidity-resistant
  • Designed with a triangular tip to sculpt the ideal brow shape
  • Built-in spoolie helps groom brow hairs and diffuse color for a natural look
  • Cruelty-free and vegetarian, Free from parabens and mineral oil
  • Available in 4 shades: 01 Jerry Brown (Medium Brown), 02 Taupe Tom (Grey Brown), 03 Woody Scooby (Deep Brown), 04 Felix Onyx (Dark Blackish Brown)

Net Weight: 0.35gms
Maximum Retail Price: Rs.499 (incl. all taxes)

Country of Origin: Korea
Company Name: SUGAR Cosmetics LLC
Company Address: 8 The Green Suite A, Dover, DE 19901, USA.

Note: The formula is waxy, soft in texture and the product gives a subtle, natural look to your brow hair!

How to Apply
  • Start at the brow arch and sketch towards the tail
  • Following your desired brow shape, create small hair-like strokes
  • Use spoolie to blend colour and groom brows
Ingredients
Iron Oxide Black(CI.77499), Stearic Acid Stearic Acid, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides
Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Iron Oxide Red(CI 77491), Iron Oxide Red(CI 77491),
Mica(CI.77019), Mica(CI.77019), Hydrogenated Palm Kernel Oil, Hydrogenated
Cottonseed Oil, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Zinc Stearate
Zinc Stearate, Microcrystalline Wax Microcrystalline Wax, Polyethylene Polyethylene,
Hydrogenated Coconut Oil Hydrogenated Coconut Oil, Titanium Dioxide(CI.77891),
Titanium Dioxide(CI.77891), Iron Oxide Yellow(CI.77492).

Commonly asked questions
Q. How to choose the right eyebrow colour?
A. Eyebrow makeup is never a one-size-fits-all situation! It’s important to consider your skin tone and hair colour before picking any makeup products for your eyebrows. Few pointers that can help you pick the right shade are mentioned below:
  • Opt for shades that are one shade lighter than your natural brow hair
  • When confused between shades, opt for cool-tone or neutral hues instead of warmer hues. For more brow makeup tips, checkout our article on how to get thick, amazing eyebrows on fleek!
Q. Should your eyebrows match your hair colour?
A. Your eyebrows should be one to two shades darker than your hair. Avoid matching your brow colour exactly to your hair colour as that may look unnatural. Here are few eyebrow makeup tips that can help - For dark black hair beauties, you can choose dark brown, brunette or medium brow shade. 01 Jerry Brown (Medium Brown), 03 Woody Scooby (Deep Brown) and 04 Felix Onyx (Dark Blackish Brown) are good picks and work best for most Indian skin tones. If you have light brown hair or blonde, look for a brow pencil with some cool undertone hues to it. You can also mix in something with a warm undertone so the colour doesn't look ashy or gray. Try our 02 Taupe Tom (Grey Brown) which works well for fair skin tones. This shade also works for people with gray hair!

Q. How to use this eyebrow definer and get the best results?
A. Arch Arrival Brow Definer is a retractable brow pencil which is quite easy to use!
Simply start with filling and defining your brows. Make sure you draw individual lines
near or between natural hairs using gentle strokes. Brush your hair and the product well using the brow spoolie. Top it off with a brow powder for a sleek finish. You can give your brows some more definition with using our bestselling three-pronged tip applicator Arch Arrival Brow Pen.

Title: Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Palette
Body:
Unleash your inner artist and create a makeup masterpiece every day with SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Palette. With a range of high-performing mattes, extra-creamy metallics & high-foil powders, these super-pigmented shades are infinitely smooth and incredibly easy to blend. Snap up these jaw-dropping hues in 4 breathtaking eight-shade palettes that come with a dual-ended applicator - it has a round blending brush at one end and a doe-tip sponge at the other. But wait, did we bring up its uber-chic packaging yet? This gorgeous tray of colours is built to dethrone the current pride of your vanity display. Talk about eye candy!

01 FLAWLESS (Warm Neutrals)

You can never go wrong with this fan-favorite palette. With soft, neutral shades of creams & golds for the lids and deep red and burgundy hues to give you a smoky-eye finish, this palette gives you all the flawless looks.

02 WARRIOR (Smokey)

The gorgeous palette contains 8 pressed powders. Ranging from peachy yellow and golds to olive browns and black; you can create a subtle smokey eye apt for office or a striking smokey eye best suited for a night out.

03 FANTASY (Mauve)

If stunning mauve shades are more into your comfort zone, try this beauty of a palette with shades ranging from nudes & gold to burgundy and plum.

04 FETISH (Nudes)

In the mood for nudes? This palette is perfect for anyone who wants a subtle wash of color on their lids. With shades ranging from dusty apricot & rose hues to sultry browns; this palette is the ultimate fetish you would want!

 How To Apply

  • Start by taking a colour that is a shade or two darker than your skin tone and run it back and forth onto your crease as a transition shade
  • Start blending at the point where you want the deepest colour, like the outer corner and aim toward the place where you want the lightest colour.  By doing this, a gradient will be created by the colour choice alone
  • Next go for the shimmer shade on the lid to get that pop. Use the doe-tip sponge applicator or a damp flat brush or your finger for that additional depth
  • Use a darker shade on the crease to define the eye shape. Start applying from the outer corner of the eye, making a ‘V’, and blend it halfway through the eyelid with the round eyeshadow blending brush.

Easy Shade Guide:

  • The lightest colour usually works well as a brow bone highlighter.
  • The second lightest colour usually looks good on the lid and creates a base to apply the shade of your choice, matte or shimmer
  • The second darkest colour usually works best on the crease
  • The darkest colour usually works best in the outer corner

Benefits: Each of the shades in the SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Palette range is richly pigmented, blendable without loss of pay-off and lasts for hours without creasing or smudging. This product is dermatologically tested & approved and 100% safe for your skin. The dual chromatic and high foil shades give intense coverage.

Additional Details: The SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Palette comes in 4 versatile options viz., 01 Flawless (Warm Neutrals), 02 Warrior (Smokey), 03 Fantasy (Mauve), 04 Fetish (Nudes). This product is free from parabens, D5, oil, mineral oil and nano-ingredients.

Net Weight: 10.4g

List Of Ingredients: Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Talc, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Magnesium Myristate, Tin Oxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Dimethicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Diisostearyl Malate, Hexyl Laurate, Zinc Stearate. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide,  Carmine, Ferric, Ferrocyanide, Bismuth Oxychloride, Ultramarines, Red 7 Lake, Yellow 5 Lake.

Title: Nothing Else Matter Longwear Lipstick
Body:
Forever trusting in this lippie formula…Yes, nothing else matters!

The lipstick of your fantasies is finally here. Get ready to applaud utter gorgeousness itself - SUGAR Nothing Else Matter Longwear Lipstick. Rich, creamy and super-plush, this lipstick glides on like butter, feels feather-light and gives you a luxe matte finish. The lip colour moves with you - meaning no more cracking, smudging, feathering or fading for up to 10 hours.

Available in 34 gorgeous shades, this lipstick adds a touch of oomph to your look, almost effortlessly. Extraordinarily hydrating, this lipstick is water-resistant, smear-proof and masks uneven lips beautifully – so you no longer have to worry about frequent touch-ups. Moreover, its easy twist-up tube makes for easy and quick application. A perfect match for the woman who likes to live her life on her own terms and who doesn’t get bothered by the world even a tad bit – This. Is It! And, nothing else matters.

Benefits:

  • Long-wear, premium matte finish lipstick
  • Water-resistant formula
  • Super-pigmented, creamy and intense opaque formula
  • Glides on comfortable and stays up to 10 hours
  • Unique formula masks the unevenness of the lips- the light shades are bomb pigmented too!
  • Enriched with vitamin E goodness
  • 100% vegan, vegetarian and cruelty-free
  • Free from parabens

    Net Weight: 3.5gms

    Maximum Retail Price: Rs.499

    Country of Origin: PRC

    Company Name: Shanghai Orain Cosmetics Co. Ltd.

    Company Address: SUGAR Cosmetics LLC, 8 The Green Suite A, Dover, DE 19901, USA

    How to apply

    Ingredients

    100% Vegan and Cruelty-free

    Dimethicone, Silica, Ceresin, Nylon-12, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Triethylhexanoin, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexyl Glycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.

    May Contain - CI 77891, CI 77491, CI 15850, CI 77499

    Commonly Asked Questions

    Q. How long does this lipstick last?
    A. This is a long-wear lipstick that stays put for good 9-10 hours! Looking for some quick and easy hacks to make your lipstick last all day? Checkout our trending blog article here.

    Q. Any bright lipsticks shades that will suit dusky skin tone?
    A. Absolutely! All shades from this range flatter brown and dusky skin beautifully. Try the subtle yet classy nudes or pinks that add a perfect pop of colour. Reds and browns are a must-try too! Title: Contour De Force Mini Blush
Body:
Transform your skin from forgettable to flawless with a pretty pop of colour from the SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Blush. Light and infinitely blendable, a kiss of this blush on your cheeks is all it takes to make you look radiant with minimal effort. The long-wearing colour is effortlessly buildable, which makes it easy to create the entire spectrum of looks from sheer to dramatic. Its lightweight, velvet formulation glides on smoothly to give natural looking colour that lasts the entire day. Swipe it on and score that perfectly flushed look within seconds!

Available In:

01 Peach Peak (Soft Peach Pink)

You really can’t go wrong with Peach Peak – a universally flattering soft peach pink tint that will warm up your cheeks with just the slightest hint of natural radiant colour.

02 Pink Pinnacle (Deep Rose)

If you’ve ever dreamed of having 50 shades of rose on your cheeks and then some… consider your wish granted with the deep rose shade that is Pink Pinnacle.

03 Mauve Marvel (Plum)
You just can't miss the sublime Goddess-like plum flush of colour on your cheeks that Mauve Marvel provides.-1000

04 Salmon Superstar (Warm Peach) 
Nothing shouts out 'Oh! So beautiful' louder than the unrivalled warm peach shade of Salmon Superstar.

05 Coral Climax (Bright Coral)
Relish the heavenly flush of colour on your cheeks with the utterly bright coral hue of Coral Climax.

 

How To Apply: You will need next to nothing of this richly pigmented blush to get a nice wash of colour. Tap the brush into the blush pan and flick the stem of the brush to knock off any excess product. Lightly tap on your cheek, and then blend using soft swirling motions.

Benefits:The light-as-air SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Blush blends like a dream into the apples of your cheeks for a seamless wash of vivid, long-lasting colour. This product is dermatologically tested & approved and 100% safe for your skin.

Additional Details: The SUGAR Contour De Force Mini Blush comes in 5 pretty shades viz., 01 Peach Pink, 02 Pink Pinnacle, 03 Mauve Marvel, 04 Salmon Superstar, 05 Coral Climax. This product is free from parabens, D5, oil, mineral oil and nano-ingredients.

Title: Dream Cover SPF15 Mattifying Compact
Body:
Ladies, ever wanted to look shine-free and picture perfect all day?

The wait is over! Get ready to meet the crème de la crème of compact powders – SUGAR Dream Cover SPF15 Mattifying Compact!  

This Vitamin E enriched, 100% mattifying powder gives you a smooth matte look that doesn’t look too ‘done’ whilst absorbing surface shine and oil for 5+ hours. A skin-perfector to its core, it doesn’t cake, creep into fine lines or block pores. Also, the SPF15 minerals protect your skin from the damaging effects of the sun rays – You need not think twice before dabbing it on when you gotta step out in the sun. Available in 5 shades, there’s one for all!  Depending on your mood for light to heavy coverage, this beauty multi-tasker has got you covered.  Comes in a super-handy compact case with a sponge, this  master of many is the go-to product when you gotta complete your makeup routine or for all the touch-ups on-the-go!

How To Use: With a sponge - Take the compact powder in a shade that matches your skin tone and apply it evenly over your face with the sponge. Ensure that you first dab the product onto the skin and then blend it. Apply the product depending on the type of coverage you want.

With a brush - Sweep some powder onto the brush and dust off the excess. Use long strokes and dab it on the face, follow it up with a sweeping motion. Blend it evenly throughout the face and the neck area.

Benefits: SUGAR Dream Cover SPF15 Mattifying Compact is enriched with Vitamin E and has SPF15 minerals that protect your skin from the damaging effects of the sun. It absorbs surface shine and oil and gives your skin the perfectly soft matte look.

Additional Details: Comes in a curated range of 5 skin-perfect tints viz. 10 Latte (light), 15 Cappuccino (light-medium), 30 Chococcino (medium), 45 Con Panna (medium-deep), 55 Americano (deep).

Net Weight: 6g

Title: Lash Mob Limitless Mascara - 01 Black With A Bang (Black)
Body:
Looking for a magic wand that will transform you from Plain Jane to Queen Bee in seconds? The Lash Mob Limitless Mascara from SUGAR gives you just the drama your eyes need! Whether you’re a fan of super volume or clump-free formula, we bet that your lashes will thank you once you’ve had your first date with this beauty. Creamy-textured and incredibly easy to apply, this paraben-free Mascara does a stellar job of separating, defining and combing through each lash so you’ll experience lashes like never before!


How to Apply: Look straight ahead #likeaboss and start with the bottom lashes while putting on the mascara so that the top lashes don’t smudge when you look down. Place your wand at the base of your lashes and using a zig-zag motion, move the wand up your lashes.

Benefits: This wonder mascara houses specially designed micro-bristles that lift, separate and unstick every lash hair and coat it with our clump-free volumizing formula. That’s not all! This game-changing makeup product also boosts the growth of your natural lashes thanks to the nourishing vitamins in the tube and contains anti-oxidants that protect them from pollutants. How’s that for packing so much punch in one miracle product!

Additional Details: The SUGAR LASH MOB LIMITLESS MASCARA is free from parabens, talc and artificial fragrances. Easy removal with warm water loosens the film and allows the formula to slide off easily. With no rubbing required, your natural lashes are left unharmed. Currently available in the shade "01 Black With A Bang".

Title: Ace Of Face Foundation Stick
Body:
Make dreamy, natural-looking skin a reality!

If you are looking for a foundation that not just looks but also feels like second skin, look no further than the SUGAR Ace Of Face Foundation Stick. It will instantly become the hero of your makeup stash and let you slay #flawlessskingoals every time!

A multi-purpose makeup tool featuring a long-wear formula and provides full-coverage in a single stroke, this foundation stick can also be used to highlight and contour. This fuss-free, easy to use creamy foundation effortlessly melts into your skin to create a gorgeous base that hides blemishes, dark spots and dark circles. It also conceals discoloration, gives a natural base and stays put for up to 12 hours. Making on-the-go touch-ups even simpler is the built-in brush that features soft bristles to ensure the formula is evenly distributed and blended well.

So, get ready to make a permanent place in your makeup bag for this magic wonder foundation stick and score sheer-to-full coverage every single time! Choose from the 22 rich shades that will match and flatter every skin tone. Plus pick darker shades to contour and accentuate your features!

Benefits:

  • Easy to use foundation stick that can double up as a concealer and contour stick
  • Lightweight, creamy texture that ensures effortless blending
  • Offers full-coverage and stays up to 12 hours
  • Covers imperfections without caking and creasing
  • On-the-go stick applicator allows for optimal precision to create perfectly sculpted look
  • The handy built-in brush allows blending with ease and ensures quick touch-ups on-the-go
  • Available in 22 shades to match every skin tone
  • Cruelty-free, 100% vegetarian; Free from mineral oil, parabens and paraffin


Net Weight: 12gms

Maximum Retail Price: Rs 999.00 (incl. all taxes)

Country of Origin: Korea
Company Name: SUGAR Cosmetics LLC
Company Address: 8 The Green Suite A, Dover, DE 19901, USA.

How to Apply
  • After prepping the skin, lightly apply across the forehead, cheeks, nose and chin
  • Blend with fingertips, sponge, or the foundation brush
  • Build coverage as desired

Ingredients
100% vegetarian and cruelty-free

Iron Oxide Yellow (CI 77492), Phenyl Trimethicone, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C12-15 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Iron Oxide Red (CI 77491), Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Polyethylene, Ceresin, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Iron Oxide Black (CI 77499), Ozokerite, Talc, Mica(CI 77019), Silica, Lauryl Peg/Ppg-18/18 Methicone, Microcrystalline Wax, Phenoxyethanol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Macadamia Seed Oil Polyglyceryl-6 Esters Behenate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lauryl Laurate, Propanediol, Dimethicone, Isostearyl Alcohol, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Methicone, BHT.

Commonly Asked Questions
Q. How many shades does this foundation come in?
A. With over 22 shades to choose from, this long-wear foundation is great for any skin tone!

Q. What is the coverage like?
A. This multi-tasking stick foundation comes with a blendable matte finish and gives good coverage. The buildable, high coverage formula ensures a non-cakey flawless base that stays for up to 12 hours.

Q. Can I use this foundation as a contour stick?
A. The lightweight texture of this stick foundation makes it perfect for applying contour atop foundation. In fact the darker shades are perfect for bronzing and the lighter shades (pick 1 or 2 shades lighter than your skin tone) work great for highlighting.

Q. How can I make my foundation last longer?
A. To perfect your makeup base, always start with hydrating your skin using a good moisturizer and prepping your skin well using a pore minimizing face primer. One quick tip to make your foundation last longer is either using a blending brush or a damp beauty blender to blend in the product well for a natural finish. For more tips and tricks to make your foundation last longer, read our article here.

Title: All Set To Go Banana Powder
Body:
Go ahead and set things right as SUGAR All Set To Go Banana Powder makes its way to the gorgeous makeup clan. A flattering setting powder that diminishes the appearance of fine lines, absorbs oil and colour corrects discolouration, its yellow/golden tone suits all skin tones. This multi-purpose powder gives you a brighter, flawless mattified skin minus the pores and flashbacks. Used by beginners to dust off excess oil from the face and by makeup artists for baking technique & contouring, this product is a step towards advanced makeup. Making your makeup last longer, it comes with no added fragrances. 

How to Apply: Dab the product under eyes or over your face using a puff or a powder brush. To bake makeup, dab SUGAR All Set To Go Banana Powder and let it set for 5 minutes. This lets your base set properly without any creases. Dust the powder properly to avoid patches. 

Benefits: SUGAR All Set To Go Banana Powder colour corrects and reduces shine by absorbing oil. Giving a luminous highlight to the skin, it sets makeup for a longer wear and reduces the look of wrinkles & fine lines. 

Additional Details: SUGAR All Set To Go Banana Powder has a yellow/golden tint. It is also used for contouring and gives the face a more chiseled look. It is paraben-free, cruelty-free, vegan and suits all skin tones. Comes with a puff applicator for smooth application.

Title: Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner
Body:
Make way, ladies - the saviour for all your winged eye woes, is here! With its silky smooth formula and a rich matte finish, the Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner, is the queen of ultra-luxe. Achieve absolute symmetry in everything from the chic-yet-casual look to the sultry cat-eye with this beauty and that’s not all. Smudge-proof and water-resistant, your eyes will now sport the boldest of tug-free flicks for 12 straight hours. Grab one today for those effortless ‘Oh! So dramatic’ looks that will stay with you through thick and thin.

Comes with a built-in extendable brush that helps you ace those perfect luscious strokes on the go. Available in 5 signature shades, this eyeliner is the Gel of the New Generation.

  • Cast an enchanting spell everywhere you go with 01 BLACKMAGIC WOMAN. With the charred black drama on your lids, you are one hell of a sorceress.

  • Slay that badass Old West vibe with the 02 ROADHOUSE BLUES. If you are done with the mundane and adventure is what stirs your soul, put some Roadhouse Blues on and glide to glory!

  • Grace the world with the utmost poise and fineness of 03 BROWN SUGAR. A timeless walnut brown classic, it is as elegant as it gets.
  • Cheat your way into a state of trance with 04 PURPLE HAZE - intense grape purple hue to bedazzle your eyes.

  • Stand out of the crowd with fierce blended perfection of 05 GREEN EYES – a dramatic deep green for that perfect feline flick!

How to Apply: Dip the built-in brush into the gel eyeliner pot. Dab it gently on the edge to remove excess. Trace a line from the inner corner, extend it towards the outer corner of the eye and rock that super-rad wing!

Benefits: With rich, creamy pigment and a bulletproof wear SUGAR Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner glides across skin smoothly to create superb, smudge-proof strokes with saturated colour. Its excellent waterproof formula has legit staying powers.

Additional Details: The richly pigmented Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested and approved. It is available in 5 fabulous shades, 01 Blackmagic Woman, 02 Roadhouse Blues, 03 Brown Sugar, 04 Purple Haze and 05 Green Eyes.

Title: Set The Tone Tinted Powder
Body:
Slay every look with perfect ease cos’ SUGAR Set The Tone Tinted Powder makes its way into the SUGAR beauty clan. It is a finely-milled multipurpose powder that lets you mattify, highlight and bake makeup in style to lend a natural, luminous matte finish. Curated for all skin tones, it blurs the appearance of pores, fine lines and absorbs excess oil. Long-lasting & paraben-free, this tinted setting powder is extremely light and blends seamlessly into the skin whilst ensuring melt-proof makeup. It is available in 5 shades and visibly highlights the skin.

  • 10 Latte is a light shade with warm undertone.
  • 15 Cappuccino is a light-medium shade with yellow undertone.
  • 30 Chococcino is a medium shade with warm undertone.
  • 45 Con Panna is a medium-deep shade with golden undertone.
  • 55 Americano is a deep shade with warm undertone.

 

How to Apply: Prep your face with a little primer or moisturizer. Apply concealer & foundation if required. Tap the container’s base to release tinted powder. Use the puff to dab a little product or swirl a brush into the powder for smooth application. Gently blow off the excess for a natural matte finish. For baking, let the powder set for around 3-5 minutes before dusting it off.

Benefits: SUGAR Set The Tone Tinted Powder suits different skin tones & is crafted to hold or set the makeup in place for a longer wear. It is oil-controlling, makes baking easy, reduces unwanted shine and gives a radiant glow to face. It lends your skin a soft-focus and a lightweight finish that doesn’t feel cakey.

Additional Details: SUGAR Set The Tone Tinted Powder comes in a range of 5 irresistible tints viz. 10 Latte (light), 15 Cappuccino (light-medium), 30 Chococcino (medium), 45 Con Panna (medium-deep), 55 Americano (deep). 

This product is dermatologically tested, approved and 100% safe for your skin.

Title: Uptown Curl Lengthening Mascara - 01 Black Beauty (Black)
Body:
Get ready to stir up a storm with a wink!

Here is the SUGAR Uptown Curl Lengthening Mascara - fulfilling all your lash fantasies. Caution: You are about to be the center of attraction with this volumizing, lengthening & curling mascara that comes with a hi-tech curved brush & an extreme black formula. This magic wand easily pulls through each lash smoothly and lays down a generous amount of product in one swipe - giving your lashes a gravity defying lift, an instant curl and a dramatic voluminous look that’s smudge-proof and clump-free, lasting for 8+ hours.

How to Apply: Prepare for the lash lift! Hold your mascara and position the wand in such a way that the claw brush spoons the curve of your lashes. Starting from the root, sweep the wand upward, guiding the shape of your lashes. For extra definition and fullness, wiggle the brush from side to side. Apply multiple coats for volume. Now move to your lower lashes: smoothen the lashes with the hollow side of the brush, from the center to the outer corner and return towards the inner corner of the eyelid. The result: incredible control for insane lashes!

Benefits: Create fluttery fullness with this ergonomically curved brush with fine bristles that coats the product on to each lash giving special attention to the inner lashes, finally saving you from the struggle to maneuver it in all different angles. The ultra-creamy, fibrous texture comes in a formula that’s not too dry, not too wet, lightweight and intensely black. This unique formula also boosts the growth of your natural lashes, fuels thickness and strength on regular use.

Additional Details: The SUGAR Uptown Curl Lengthening Mascara is paraben-free. Easy removal with warm water or makeup remover. One swipe of either loosens the film and allows the formula to slide off easily.

Available in the shade "01 Black Beauty (Black)".

Title: Seal The Show Lip Primer
Body:
Lipstick aficionados, listen up! The ultimate lip game-changer is here.


To put an end to your lipstick woes and to bring huge smiles to your faces, literally - we bring you the hero behind the scenes, SUGAR Seal The Show Lip Primer. Be it matte or creamy, metallic or glossy - your NEED for a base coat for your lips ends here. Just a single colourless swipe of this primer locks moisture in and prevents lipcolours from feathering and settling into the lip cracks. It creates an incredibly smooth, crease-free canvas allowing your lipcolour to stay put throughout your day, as you multitask eating, sipping and chatting. It comes in a twist-up pen form, is completely handy, lightweight and does not feel cakey on the lips. Now, you need not sweat about lip creasing and bleeding as the hero does its job... and a pretty good one at that!

You wouldn't know what you are missing out on until you own this ground-breaking lip primer. Get ready for the amazing lip lock, chicas!

How To Apply: Exfoliate your lips. Apply lip primer just like you would apply any other lipstick. Follow it up with your favourite lipcolour.

Benefits: SUGAR Seal The Show Lip Primer gives a flawless base for lipcolours by preventing lip creasing. It increases the longevity of the lipcolours and prevents it from feathering.

Additional Details: SUGAR Seal The Show Lip Primer lends a colourless hydrating finish to the lips and comes in a twist-up pen form. It is handy and lightweight.

Title: Stroke Of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl
Body:
Eye makeup can be tricky but a stroke of genius can put you at ease. Add to that intense colour and soft creamy texture and you know you've been hooked for life. We're on about SUGAR Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl - a waterproof Kohl pencil that can add pretty to your eyes in a single swipe. Its wax-based formula spreads evenly and lasts for up to 8 hours. Not just that, it comes with a free sharpener to ensure your eye makeup is always on point.

  • For all you feisty bold women who never go out of style because you go Back To Black! Entice the world with your power when you don this pitch black temptress.

  • For all you strong sassy women who don’t wait for the storm to pass, but dance in the Purple Rain. Captivate the world with your guts when you swipe this purple seductress.

  • For all you spirited women with LIT attitude, whose hearts revel in the Green Light. Allure the cosmos with your passion when you sport this green goddess.

  • For the once in a lifetime kind of women who own the ground they walk on with Blue Suede Shoes. Amaze the Universe with your confidence as you slay this royal blue bombshell.

  • For all you alluring women who have everyone under their spell, and in your eyes, have the sins of Black Magic. Bewitch the whole world with vigour as you rock this black enchantress with silver glitter.

  • For all you passionate women out there who aim for the Blue Skies. Stun them with style as you swipe this navy blue wonder on.

  • For all you charming women who walk with the captivating grace of Peacock. Dazzle everyone with this fascinating peacock green.

  • For the vivacious woman who is the quintessential Brown Eyed Girl. Mesmerize them all with this gorgeous walnut brown.

Bonus: Every Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl comes with its specially designed high quality sharpener that is carefully crafted to help you make the most of your purchase. For more details about the Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl Sharpener.

How to apply: Gently rim your lower and upper lash lines with this creamy Kohl. Open your eyes wide for precise application.

Benefits: This high-performance waterproof Kohl provides maximum colour in a single stroke and lasts for up to 8 hours. Its creamy texture makes application super easy and helps to create varied eye makeup looks in a matter of minutes.

Additional details: The SUGAR Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl is currently available in the 8 shades 01 Back to Black, 02 Purple Rain, 03 Green Light, 04 Blue Suede Shoes, 05 Black Magic, 06 Blue Skies, 07 Peacock, 08 Brown Eyed Girl. It is free of mineral oil, paraffin, preservatives and volatile cyclomethicones (D4, D5, D6).

Body:
Let your eyes do all the talking with SUGAR Twist And Shout Fadeproof Kajal! Just twist the easy applicator and rim your eyes with its intense formula and you're good to take on the world. With a specially-designed anti-slip grip gives you a super-steady hold, its creamy consistency & preservatives-free formula makes it suitable for the waterline as well as the lash line. It gives a velvety finish that is long-lasting & completely fade-proof so you can enjoy the night (or day) and not worry about smears or smudges.

01 Back In Black (Black) – Helps you discover the power of your eyes!

How to apply

Shake the liquid eyeliner well before use. Immerse the applicator with the eyeliner pigment and brush off any excess product before application. Start thick at the outer corner of the eye, stamping small dots on the edge, tapering in closer to the inner corners of your eye by using the bottom lash line as a guide. And voila! You have officially unlocked the easiest way to ace the classiest doe–eyed look! Read more about how to ace a winged eyeliner look here.

Pro Tip: To remove, use cotton pads soaked in make-remover or warm water and gently wipe it off.

Best paired with:

A smokey eyeshadow palette of your choice. Add lots of mascara for length and volume. Finish with a highly pigmented highlighter and a nude lip colour.

Benefits

SUGAR Gloss Boss 24HR Eyeliner is powered by:

- Felt tip applicator (For goof-proof application)
- 24-hr stay formula (Won't budge no matter what!)
- All good things (Free of parabens)

Commonly asked questions

Q. What kind of finish does the eyeliner give?
A. You’ll get a highly pigmented, luxurious, non-matte finish in a single stroke.

Q. How long does it last?
A. SUGAR Floss Boss 24HR Eyeliner will last up to 24 hours on your eyes!

Q. Will it be difficult to remove because of the stay power?
A. Not at all! You can easily remove it with makeup remover or warm water.

Q. Should I be careful? Are there ingredients that could irritate my eye?
A. Relax, love. The formula is free of parabens, IPBC and formaldehyde-releasing compounds. The product is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested & approved and 100% safe for you.

Q. Is the product vegan?
A. Yes, the product is vegan-friendly! Read more about why cruelty free cosmetic products are the way to go for the future.

Title: Arrested For Overstay Waterproof Eyeliner - 01 I'll Be Black (Black)
Body:
Always on the go but can't live without a little wing? Your search for that perfect feline flick ends right here, right now! The SUGAR Arrested For Overstay Waterproof Eyeliner (quite literally a pen!) glides on smoothly and stays on until you say when. So whether you’re a makeup newbie or a pro - creating a range of eye-opening looks, from statement bold graphic lines to carefully crafted cat eyes has never been this easy. But wait, there’s more to your newest SUGAR crush – did we mention that it’s 100% waterproof? Be it sweaty workouts or dips in the sea, this new must-have is the wonder liner your collection is missing. Grab it now!

How to Apply: For a subtle defining line, draw the tip of the pen from the inner to the outer eye corner, sticking as close to the lash line as possible. Slant the pen and add more pressure to create a bolder line or continue to layer until you achieve desired definition.

Benefits: Designed with a precision tip for complete control over your eye artistry, the eyeliner delivers super-subtle lines and flicks with an ease that you can build up slowly for a more dramatic look. The blacker-than-black pigment is perfectly opaque and won’t fade, run, crack or melt come rain or shine.

Additional Details: Shake the eyeliner pen before using so the formula saturates the felt tip. For best results, wipe tip with a damp tissue before applying to prevent powder build-up, which may cause the eyeliner pen to dry out. Currently available in the shade "01 I’ll Be Black".

Title: Face Fwd >> Corrector Stick
Body:
Meet the super effective Face FWD >> Corrector Stick. Comes in 3 shades that address DARK CIRCLES, HYPERPIGMENTATION, BLEMISHES, REDNESS, SCARS and SPOTS! Beginner-friendly and loved by pros, these made-in-Korea sticks work like magic on imperfections helping you achieve a perfectly-flawless canvas.
  • 01 Peach Precedent: For fair to light-medium skin tones.
    Covers dark circles, pigmentation and light-toned blemishes.

  • 02 Onward Orange: For medium to dark skin tones.
    Covers dark circles, pigmentation and dark-toned blemishes.

  • 03 Jade Jockey: For all skin tones.
    Cancels out redness or red-toned scars, acne or spots.


How to apply: Dab a (very) tiny amount with a very light hand on the areas you want to correct, and blend immediately with fingers. Very pigmented products, so use sparingly and it will last you for a long long time. Yay!

Benefits: Covers imperfections, pigmentation, dark circles, spots, blemishes. Travel-friendly, highly pigmented, very little goes a long way, excellent for beginners, made in Korea.

Additional details: SUGAR Face FWD >> Range comprises of 5 stunning products - Face FWD >> Primer Stick, Face FWD >> Blush Stick (in 3 shades), Face FWD >> Contour Stick (in 2 shades), Face FWD >> Corrector Stick (in 3 shades), and Face FWD >> Highlight Stick (in 3 shades).

Title: Never Say Dry Crème Lipstick
Body:
If you want the best of both worlds and love to have it all, then the SUGAR Never Say Dry Crème Lipstick is made just for you! Intensely pigmented and long-wearing with a baby-soft finish, its creamy texture effortlessly straddles the line between glossy and matte for an easy, everyday look. The high-colour payoff formula is loaded with Vitamin E that locks in both colour and moisture. A roll-on wonder that saves you from the hassle of prepping, priming and lining your lips – it’s all you need to quickly go from ‘Goddamn’ to ‘Goddess’. Free of mineral oil, lanoline and parabens. Full of vibrant colour that you’re sure to swoon over – try it out, today!
  • Whether you want to rock the minimal make-up face, or wish to be a little extra, Subtle Island will never let you down! A gorgeous fusion of muted brown and pink, this is your safe haven and something that you know can never go wrong.

  • For the days when you’re mixing it up with the cute and the kickass, pick Dial M for Magenta as your warpaint of choice! This no-nonsense deep magenta is something that will keep up with the many moods that you effortlessly slip in and out of, all in the same day.

  • The colour of a warm hug, The Brown Ultimatum will remind you of snuggles, cuddles and everything happy in your perfect day. This nude brown shade is the ultimate pick-me-up for when you are even close to feeling the blues.

  • When it’s your turn to be flawlessly fabulous, shush the naysayers with a single swipe of Revolutionary Rose. A classic rose pink shade, this one blends all that is bold and stylish into one easy-to-carry look.

  • When all the caffeine in the world fails to give you a rush, you know you can count on Berry Maguire to be your cheerleader even on the most ‘meh’ of days. Try this deep berry red for a signature look that announces your arrival even before you say “Hello!"

  • Dedicated to those who play delicate darling and badass boss-girl with equal panache - Raisin Helen is a deep-neutral blend of rose and brown that is tough to get enough of. Inspired by the '90s, perfected this season - this one really is the best of both worlds!

  • A vivacious amalgamation of everything across the spectrum of pink - here is one shade that screams nothing but love! Cross your heart and hope to die - your love-lust relationship with Jack Peacher and its peachy-apricot feels is here to stay.

  • Trade in all your office-wear classics for the deep mauve hue of Mauve Actually! A stark departure from the safe haven of formal nudes, this is one unapologetic shade that flaunts the unconventional to add the pretty in ‘pretty serious’

  • When it hasn't been your day, your week, your month or even your year... this rich coral mixed with the hottest shade of pink, will always be there for you! A pocketful of sunshine with a hint of sexy - the A Christmas Coral shade is your very own hot cup of happy.

  • An everyday ally in your many missions to save the world - The Plum Diary sports a deep berry tone that cuts through clutter and paparazzi with equal ease. Bold but not brazen - this vibrant shade is a great starting point for those looking to switch things up a little!

  • Rave on Red Poet’s Society with a healthy overdose of classy red and pure luxe. The best-known hack for channeling your inner Queen Elizabeth - this vintage bold shade is a must-have for every vanity bag and exudes nothing but richness.

 

How to Apply: Starting from the center of your upper lip, gently slide the lipstick outward towards the corners while paying attention to fill in the arches carefully. On the lower lip, start at one edge and follow the natural curve. Use a tissue to blot out any excess product. Reapply for a smoother and longer-lasting finish.

Benefits: SUGAR Never Say Dry Crème Lipstick has a creamy, feather-light texture that spreads evenly on the lips.

Additional Details: SUGAR Never Say Dry Crème Lipstick is available in 11 vibrant shades viz., 01 Subtle Island, 02 Dial M For Magenta, 03 The Brown Ultimatum, 04 Revolutionary Rose, 05 Berry Maguire, 06 Raisin Helen, 07 Mauve Actually, 08 Jack Peacher, 09 A Christmas Coral, 10 The Plum Diary and 11 Red Poet's Society. This product is dermatologically tested & approved and 100% safe for your skin.

Net Weight: 3.5 gm.

List of Ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polybutene, Octyldodecanol, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Microcrystalline Wax, PPG-26 Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer Polyethylene, Behenyl Dimethicone, Synthetic Beeswax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Cetyl Dimethicone/Bis-Vinyldimethicone Crosspolymer, Aluminum Hydroxide, Flavor, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, May Contain Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Bismuth Oxychloride, Red 7 Lake, Yellow 5 Lake, Red 28 Lake, Red 6 Lake, Blue 1 Lake.

Title: Eye Dared You So! Metallic Eyeliner
Body:
Ditch the usual and own the glamorous - let there be no monotony cos' SUGAR Eye Dared You So! Metallic Eyeliner is here! Now is your time to cross the line and step into the world of glamour and glitz. Line your lids with this long-lasting, waterproof and smudge-proof metallic eyeliner. Comes in six bold & shimmering shades whose liquid formula is quick drying and gives a rich matte finish. The brush applicator ensures for a smooth application of the product so that you're ready to wing it, anytime, any day!

 

  • Give them a reason to swoon with the metallic coppery bronze richness of Bronze Horseman.
  • Make the saying 'Too glam to give a damn' true with the metallic purple lavishness of Purple Pirate.
  • Go make the world your oyster with the metallic darkened copper drama of Copper Gauntlet.
  • Jump spark your most arresting assets with the metallic royal blue dazzle of Blue Moon.
  • Ace being both a beauty and a savage with the metallic teal green oomph of Green Mile.
  • Let the universe know you're a force to be reckoned with when you don black with silver microglitter of Black Mirror. 


How To Apply: Shake the product well before use. Sweep the brush applicator across your lash line for a precise liner look. For a more intense look, re-apply and slay the day!

Benefits: SUGAR Eye Dared You So! Metallic Eyeliner gives a rich matte-metallic finish that's long-lasting and waterproof. It is cruelty-free and paraben free.

Additional Details: SUGAR Eye Dared You So! Metallic Eyeliner is available in 6 bold shades viz. 01 Bronze Horseman (Metallic Coppery Bronze), 02 Purple Pirate (Metallic Purple), 03 Copper Gauntlet (Metallic Darkened Copper), 04 Blue Moon (Metallic Royal Blue), 05 Green Mile (Metallic Teal Green), 06 Black Mirror (Black with Silver micro glitter).
