Title: Eyes And Shine Shadow Crayon
Body:
Applaud the arrival of SUGAR Eyes And Shine Shadow Crayon! Here to give you an experience of time-saving ecstasy, this eyeshadow crayon is seriously versatile and shouts 'makeup simplified' for girls on-the-go. Available in 10 sizzling shades, this creamy & easy-to-glide eyeshadow stick lets you achieve flawless eye makeup looks pronto. Specially formulated with precious ultra-fine pearls to add a soft sculpting effect and shine polymers to boost lustre, Eyes And Shine Shadow Crayon boasts 8+hour comfort wear. Preservative-free & water-resistant, this high coverage and matte finish eyeshadow crayon is going to be the new talk of the town!
  • Get that sizzling vibe on with the metallic cobalt blue razzmatazz of Sapphire Sizzle.
  • It's time to get euphoric as you don the metallic pine green charm of Emerald Ecstasy.
  • People are gonna swoon over the metallic pink champagne pomp of Garnet Glitz.
  • Ohh that exuberating zest! It's the magic of the matte black Onyx Oomph.
  • Step out with élan with the brown & golden glittered spark of Jasper Jazz.
  • "And, it was all yellow!" The metallic yellow gold in Citrine Crackle will surely spike up the X factor.

  • Go high or go home! This metallic turquoise in Turquoise Trance takes you on a roller coaster ride.

  • Experience beautiful rhapsody with the metallic cranberry delight that is Ruby Rapture.
  • You can't help but be under a spell cast by the gorgeous champagne gold of Topaz Twinkle.
  • Baby girl, own that beautiful madness in you with the warm copper in Carnelian Chaos.


How To Apply: The multi-purpose SUGAR Eyes And Shine Shadow Crayon shades lend different finishes and can also be used as highlighters and brighteners to get a bright intense look. Apply the crayon on your upper eyelid. Draw a line from the inner to outer corner of the eye or the entire eyelid. Blend smoothly. You could also add other shades to complement the first. 100% blendable, the product needs to be blended before it settles to a gorgeous finish. 

Benefits: Augmented with Auto-Fixing Chrono Technology, this twist-up product creates a transforming texture that provides smooth application and long-lasting comfortable wear. Enriched with shine polymers that boost radiance and give a shimmering effect, SUGAR Eyes And Shine Shadow Crayon has ultra-fine pearls to lend a stunning finish.

Additional Details: SUGAR Eyes And Shine Shadow Crayon is available in 10 sizzling shades viz., 01 Sapphire Sizzle, 02 Emerald Ecstasy, 03 Garnet Glitz, 04 Onyx Oomph, 05 Jasper Jazz, 06 Citrine Crackle, 07 Turquoise Trance, 08 Ruby Rapture, 09 Topaz Twinkle, 10 Carnelian Chaos.

Title: Magic Wand Waterproof Concealer
Body:
SUGAR Magic Wand Waterproof Concealer has arrived to weave its magic in your life. This multi-purpose makeup must-have blurs, smooths and conceals imperfections. Don’t think twice before stepping out of the house cos’ this essential helps you say bye to dark circles, puffy eyes and acne. Fine lines, wrinkles and blemishes – all go out of the door with the long-lasting 8 hour wear and the flawless full coverage of this versatile product. It is enriched with Anise fruit extract that helps to soften the skin by protecting it and lends it a natural glow. It comes with a flat tip applicator for a smooth application and is available in 6 shades for all skin types.
  • 07 VANILLA LATTE is a fair shade with golden undertone

  • 12 CON LECHE is a light shade with golden undertone

  • 15 CAPPUCCINO is a light shade with cool undertone

  • 30 CHOCOCCINO is medium shade with warm undertone

  • 40 BREVE is medium beige shade with warm undertone

  • 45 CON PANNA is medium beige shade with golden undertone

How to Apply: Prep your under eye area to create a smooth canvas for concealer. Using the tip of the flat tip applicator or fingers, dot SUGAR Magic Wand Waterproof Concealer under your eye and blend well. Blend instantly on targeted areas as it has a quick-drying formula. To add highlight, use 1 or 2 shades lighter than the concealer shade and place on the high points of your face.

Benefits: A little goes a long way for a well-rested look with this concealer. The full coverage, waterproof formula lends a soft matte finish that lasts long for up to 8 hours. Anise fruit extract in the product promotes the appearance of glowing skin. Lightweight, highly-pigmented and skin-perfecting; this product is free of parabens, is vegan and cruelty-free.

Additional Details: SUGAR Magic Wand Waterproof Concealer consists of 6 shades, viz. 07 Vanilla Latte, 12 Con Leche, 15 Cappuccino, 30 Chococcino, 40 Breve, 45 Con Panna. This product is dermatologically tested, approved and 100% safe for skin.

Body:
A highly-pigmented, retractable crème lipstick with a long-lasting, water-resistant wear. SUGAR Plush Crush Crème Crayon comes enriched with Vitamin E, Collagen, Hyaluronic Acid and Pomegranate Fruit Extract for nourishment and hydration.

Title: Power Clay SPF20 BB Cushion (Refill)
Body:
A super lightweight and oil-controlling formula that improves complexion evenness and minimizes the appearance of fine lines. Gives light to medium buildable coverage and settles to a silky matte finish. 

  • 05 BLONDE LATTE is a light shade with neutral undertone.

  • 07 VANILLA LATTE is a light shade with golden undertone.

Benefits: It gives buildable coverage and a soft and seamless finish. Bentonite clay helps in controlling sebum overproduction. It’s small, travel-friendly, and has a non-messy application. It also comes with a built-in mirror for an instant glam session.

Title: Air Kiss Powder Lipstick
Body:
Seal it with a KISS!

Experience what magic feels like on your lips with India’s 1st ever Air Kiss Powder Lipstick.

Yes, you read that right! We bring to you this unique lipstick, in a breakthrough powder formula that magically transforms into a sleek matte finish when applied. Weightless, transfer-proof and water-resistant, the incredibly soft formula dries off within seconds and leaves behind a bold burst of colour that stays put for hours without any streaks.

Commonly Asked Questions
Q. How does the SUGAR powder lipstick work?
A: This unique lipstick comes in a ground-breaking lightweight powder texture that melts into a velvety matte finish when applied on your lips. Extremely opaque, comfortable on the lips and non-drying; its transfer-proof formula leaves behind a bold burst of pigment!

Q. Will this powder lipstick dry my lips?
A: Absolutely NOT! This unique Air Kiss Powder Lipstick has the goodness of glycerin and silica to keep your lips moisturized and supple. For your matte lipstick to last longer, we recommend prepping lips well using an exfoliating lip scrub to get rid of dead skin and following it up with a hydrating lip balm.

Q. How do you use this powder lipstick?
A: Using a powder lipstick is pretty much the same as your regular matte lipsticks.
  • Directly apply the powder lipstick onto your lips.
  • See it magically transform into a sleek matte finish within a few seconds!

Q: Can I use this powder lipstick on my cheeks?
A: Totally! Our SUGAR Air Kiss Powder Lipstick is super multi-talented! Owing to its incredibly soft and blendable formula, you can use it as cheek tint for that perfect flush of colour or as an eyeshadow to elevate your eye makeup looks!

Title: Coffee Culture Lip Scrub
Body:
Are dry, flaky lips ruining your perfect pout? We got your back! Try the super nourishing SUGAR Coffee Culture Lip Scrub. This unique lip scrub in a easy-to-use stick format is infused with tiny granules of coffee along with coffee seed oil which gently exfoliates your lips to reveal smooth, plump and hydrated lips.

Perfect for pre-lipstick application, Coffee Culture Lip Scrub with a creamy, wax-based formula polishes your lips, removes dryness and flakiness and leads lips extra softness and suppleness. It buffs away dead skin and lightens pigmentation, leaving you with smooth, pink lips. Expertly crafted with glycerin, olive fruit oil, jojoba seed oil and almond oil, this 100% vegetarian coffee lip scrub will leave your lips with a lasting shot of hydration!

How it works:

- The super hydrating lip scrub is made using fine coffee particles that buffs away dry, chapped lips while the medley of soothing oils nourish, soothe and heal flaky lips
- Packed with the goodness of caffeine, it lightens pigmentation and gives you super smooth, pink lips
- The formula leaves a soft, buttery film. It smoothes and preps lips, creating a clean canvas for your lipstick to glide on flawlessly
- The formula is 100% vegan, cruelty-free and free from parabens, alcohol and sulphates

Key ingredients:

- Minute coffee granules help scrub away dead skin cells and flakiness, giving you a smooth pout
- Olive, jojoba and almond oil soothe the lips and give them intense moisturization
- Coffee seed oil rejuvenates the skin and lightens pigmentation, leaving behind soft, shiny lips

Ingredients

Candelilla Wax, Coffee, Sugar, Jojoba Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Shea Butter, Coffea Arabica(Coffee) Seed Oil, Olive Oil, Caffeine, Vitamin E


How to apply

- Step 1: Using soft, circular motions, use the scrub stick to buff your lips. Let it sit for 2-3 minutes
- Step 2: Gently wipe off with a moistened tissue paper or towel to reveal soft, smooth lips
- Step 3: Apply a moisturizing lip balm, followed by a lip primer and your favourite lipstick!
- Use this coffee lip scrub 2-3 times a week for best results!

Beauty tips: Rejuvenate, hydrate and boost skin radiance using SUGAR Coffee Culture Skincare range! Try the skin brightening serum, eye cream and perfect your pout using the lip scrub.


Commonly Asked Questions

Q. Will this coffee lip scrub lighten my lips?
A. Using this coffee lip scrub will help exfoliate the top layer of your skin, thus diminishing any discolouration or pigmentation. It will leave behind soft, smooth, supple lips.

Q. How often can I use it?
A. Over-exfoliating can cause irritation and skin sensitivity. As the skin on the lips is extremely delicate, make sure you exfoliate no more than twice or thrice a week. This gentle lip scrub can be used 2-3 times a week. Do use gentle, circular motions to scrub your lips.

Q. Is the formula safe to use on lips?
A. Yes, the SUGAR Coffee Culture Lip Scrub is absolutely safe to use. It is vegan, cruelty-free and dermatologically tested.

Title: Coffee Culture Eye Firming Cream
Body:
If you battle with dark circles and tired-looking eyes, you’ve come to the right place! Try the super-light and refreshing SUGAR Coffee Culture Firming Eye Cream. Enriched with skin soothing seaweed, hyaluronic acid and shea butter, it gives your under-eyes a boost of moisture, brightens and helps to strengthen the skin barrier. This intensely moisturizing anti-fatigue eye cream is infused with caffeine which depuffs delicate skin around your eyes, smoothes out skin and keeps fine lines at bay. It also contains peony extract which is known for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties along with skin healing cica, which is prized for its anti-ageing properties.

This multi-tasking eye cream packed with skin-loving ingredients helps boost circulation, revives your under-eye area, making you look instantly refreshed and more awake! Plus, the formula is super lightweight, non-sticky and absorbs quickly. Coffee Culture Firming Eye Cream comes with a note-wrothy formula and a unique roll-on applicator- make it a part of your everyday skincare routine to nourish, repair and soothe your eyes!

How it works:

- A hydrating eye cream enriched with caffeine, hyaluronic acid and seaweed
- It instantly energizes your under-eye area with a burst of moisture
- Gentle formula helps reduce dark circles, puffiness, fine lines and wrinkles
- Features a roll-on applicator for a targeted, mess-free application. It helps depuff the under eye area and reduces swelling
- Hyaluronic acid hydrates, plumps up the skin and makes it look smooth
- Skin-loving ingredients such as cica and peony root help reduce swelling and inflammation
- This rejuvenating formula helps restore skin’s natural moisture barrier
- This product is 100% vegan, free from parabens, sulphates, mineral oil and absolutely cruelty-free

Key ingredients:

- Coffee is a rich source of antioxidants, increases blood circulation and energizes the under-eye area. It is known for its skin-rejuvenating and soothing properties
- Hyaluronic acid plumps and moisturizes skin
- Seaweed locks in moisture and gives you skin that is plump, smooth and supple. It also reduces fine lines and wrinkles
- Cica helps soothe irritated and damaged skin, while also providing intense hydration

Commonly Asked Questions

Q. How is the formula of this eye cream?
A. This 100% vegetarian, cruelty-free and gentle formula is refreshing and soothing for the delicate under-eye area!

Q. Does it help with dark circles and puffiness?
A. This eye cream has caffeine which is great for reducing dark circles and puffiness by improving blood circulation!

Q. Can I use this under makeup?
A. You absolutely can. Use this eye cream on a clean, dry face and follow it with a lightweight serum, like the SUGAR Coffee Culture Brightening Serum. Wait for it to absorb and use a primer and foundation, as you usually do.

Q. Is hyaluronic acid good for the skin?
A. It is amazing for your skin! Hyaluronic acid is a naturally occurring molecule that helps the skin retain tons of moisture. It reduces fine lines and wrinkles by plumping your skin. It is safe to use for even the most sensitive skin – but make sure you do a patch test first!

Q. I have dry skin. Can I use this mask?

This helps prevent breakouts, making it great for acne-prone skin. It also contains caffeine which rejuvenates the skin and prevents breakouts. Plus, it won’t dry out your skin like most clay masks!

Title: Citrus Got Real SPF30 Sunscreen
Body:
Keep your skin healthy while enjoying summertime using the new SUGAR Citrus Got Real SPF30 Sunscreen that works perfect in hot, humid weather and gives a fresh glow to your complexion.

This creamy, light-weight, vitamin C based sunscreen not only brightens dull skin but can also help minimize photo aging, reduce dark spots and hyperpigmentation. This broad-spectrum sunscreen with SPF30 acts as a shield to defend skin against harmful UVA and UVB rays. Its super-enriching formula is infused with the goodness of orange peel oil, arginine and glycerine that instantly brighten, nourish, visibly firm and plump skin while providing a boost of hydration. A hero ingredient in the Citrus Got Real skincare range, orange peel oil packed with powerful anti-oxidants and anti-inflammatory benefits, nourishes and soothes dry, irritated and acne-prone skin, promoting brighter complexion. Striking a fantastic balance between a matte formula that simultaneously rejuvenates and hydrates the skin, this sunscreen does not leave a white cast and works perfect for all skin types.

From bringing out your inner radiance to ensuring your skin is protected while out and about, this sunscreen truly is a multi-tasker! Moreover, it even exudes a citrusy and uplifting scent that’s just so perfect to give you and your skin, a fresh and energized feel and reminds you of nothing else but sweet summer. No matter what your day looks like, soak up the sun without any worry in the world because this sunscreen’s got your back!

How it works:

- Sunscreen powered by vitamin C goodness - it protects your skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays and keeps it nourished. Vitamin C helps in diminishing skin damage induced by sun exposure and is known for brightening skin!
- This broad-spectrum sunscreen is ideal for all skin types—even the most sensitive
- It provides effective SPF30 protection without leaving behind any greasy feel
- The gentle, skin-soothing formula brightens skin; reduces the appearance of dark spots and blemishes
- Gives a boost of moisture for supple, smooth and fresher looking skin
- Compact packaging makes it convenient to slip into your bag and take along for effortless on-the-go reapplication
- SUGAR Citrus Got Real range is 100% vegan, free from parabens, sulphates, mineral oil and absolutely cruelty-free


Key Ingredients:

- Orange peel oil is a natural source of antioxidant that minimizes the effect of sun damage on skin, brightens complexion and protects it from external environmental stressors. Orange oil also has a remarkable ability to inhibit melanin production and slows the rate of skin damage experienced from UV light exposure, pollution and toxicity.

- Arginine is an amino acid naturally occurring in the skin and works by boosting collagen production, improves skin elasticity and intensely moisturizes skin.

- Glycerine acts as a humectant and emollient that improves skin texture and gives it a smooth, supple and nourished feel.

Ingredients

How to apply
Wear alone, layer over your favorite serum and moisturizer or under makeup.

- Step 1: Start by cleansing and toning your skin thoroughly.
- Step 2: Apply a small amount of the Citrus Got Real Daily Moisturizer that hydrates, freshens up your skin.
- Step 3: Take an adequate amount of the sunscreen formula and apply on your face, neck and areas that are exposed and massage until absorbed. Reapply as necessary.


Pair it with:

You can pair it with the vitamin C enriched Citrus Got Real Daily Moisturizer to provide your skin with a lush boost of hydration and other skin-enriching products such as the Citrus Got Real Refreshing Mist and the soothing Citrus Got Real Cooling Stick.


Commonly asked questions
Q. How many times should I apply sunscreen?
A. You should apply sunscreen 15 to 20 minutes before you go outside so it has time to get absorbed in your skin, then reapply at 2-3 hour intervals throughout the day. Reapply sunscreen more frequently just after you’ve been swimming, as the water will wash it off. The same is true if you’ve been sweating, so you may need to apply more than every 2 hours.

Q. How is the formula of this sunscreen?
A. This SPF30 powered sunscreen is designed to protect and shield your skin in the gentlest way. It has a non-greasy texture that feels extremely light on skin, absorbs super quick and doesn’t leave behind any sticky feel.

Q. Is arginine good for skin?
A. Arginine, or L-arginine, is a semi-essential amino acid and is known for its skin-caring properties. It helps maintain the skin's moisture and smoothness. It also functions as an antioxidant to help naturally build collagen production, promoting elasticity and vitality.

Q. What does a broad spectrum sunscreen mean?
A. The term ‘broad-spectrum sunscreen’ is used to describe a sunscreen that can help protect skin from the sun's harmful ultraviolet A (UVA) and ultraviolet B (UVB) rays. Since both these sunrays can lead to sunburn and skin damage, it is always safe to use a sunscreen that offers broad-spectrum SPF protection.

Q. Is this sunscreen vegan?
A. Made with skin-benefiting natural ingredients, Citrus Got Real Daily Moisturizer is free from animal ingredients, 100% vegan and cruelty-free.

Title: Citrus Got Real Retinol Brightening Serum
Body:
A weightless, fast-absorbing serum that visibly brightens dull skin and takes care of concerns like acne, wrinkles, blemishes, pores and pigmentation. Introducing SUGAR's power-packed Citrus Got Real Retinol Brightening Serum infused with skin boosting vitamin C rich orange peel oil and gold standard ingredient in anti-aging 'retinol' goodness. Retinol aids in skin's renewal process by boosting collagen while orange peel oil soothes and heals breakouts, hydrates and boosts skin glow. This skin elixir is a perfect addition in your night time skincare routine.

Part of our classic bestselling skincare range 'Citrus Got Real' - this light weight, fragrance-free serum is packed with brightening licorice root (mulethi), honey goodness and centella asiatica (gotu kola) extracts that together add intense moisture, smooth away fine lines, wrinkles and target uneven skin tone​. Citrus Got Real Retinol Brightening Serum also is infused with 'sodium hyaluronate' that helps maintain the firmness of the skin and encourages moisture retention. The vitamin-rich 'Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate' in this potent formula which is obtained from fermenting and filtering yeast, helps in adding moisture, supports in skin regeneration and gives you radiant-looking, smooth complexion! Formulated using a unique blend of herbal extracts and natural ingredients, this 100% vegan retinol serum works brilliantly for acne-prone, oily, dry, sensitive and even mature, aging skin! Try it today to see bright skin results.

Features:

  • This skin brightening serum powered by retinol fights signs of aging and promotes smooth, supple and visibly radiant complexion
  • It rejuvenates dull, dry skin, lightens spots, blemishes and promotes even skin tone
  • Infused with radiance boosting vitamin C goodness in the form of orange peel oil and extracts
  • Enriched with intensely nourishing natural ingredients like honey, allantoin, centella asiatica along with natural herbal extracts
  • Non-sticky, intensely moisturizing formula with delicate citrusy natural fragrance to soothe your senses
  • This potent formula reduces wrinkles, fine lines, dark spots, minimizes pores and gives you brighter, smoother and softer-looking complexion
  • 100% vegan and cruelty formula
  • Non-comedogenic, fragrance-free and dermatologically-tested skincare product
  • Suits all skin types including sensitive skin

Net Weight: 20ml
Maximum Retail Price: Rs.499
Country of Origin: PRC
Company Name: SUGAR Cosmetics LLC
Company Address: 8 The Green, Suite A, Dover, DE 19901
How to Use
  • Take 3-4 drops of the face serum onto your palm
  • Massage in upward circular motion until completely absorbed. Follow it up with a moisturizer
  • Recommended to use in your nighttime skincare routine
Ingredients
Key Ingredients:
  • Retinol: A derivative of vitamin A, retinol exfoliates the skin, increases skin cell turnover and stimulates collagen synthesis. This muti-tasking anti-aging ingredients tackles skin concerns like acne, fine lines, dark spots, dullness and dark circles
  • Citrus Reticulata (Mandarin Orange) Peel Extracts: Packed with vitamin A and C goodness, this natural ingredient brightens dull skin and lightens blemishes and spots. Vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant that can protect the skin from free radicals as well as from harmful rays of the sun and diminishes the appearance of sun damage
  • Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil: Packed with antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, skin lightening, and anti-microbial properties, this intensely hydrating natural oil minimizes skin dryness, diminishes fine lines and wrinkles and fights against inflammation, breakouts and acne!
  • Licorice Root Extracts: Licorice root extract also known as mulethi works great for irritated, dry and acne-prone skin. It is known to contain a compound known as glycyrrhizin, which has anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial properties and can be used to treat skin conditions like acne and eczema
  • Scutellaria Baicalensis Extracts: An herb used in traditional Chinese medicine, Scutellaria baicalensis is a species of flowering plant and is also commonly known as Chinese skullcap. Packed with antioxidants, it helps in brightening, hydrating and soothing irritated skin
  • Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extracts: Packed with antioxidant, anti-inflammatory and antiaging benefits, Centella Asiatica help soothe and repair dry, acne-prone and irritated skin. It works to restore your skin's moisture barrier and boosts skin elasticity

Complete Ingredient List: Aqua, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Retinol, Trehalose, Butylene Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis Extract (Licorice), Scutellaria Baicalensis Extract (Baikal Skullcap/Chinese Skullcap), Centella Asiatica Extract (Gotukola), Astragalus Membranaceus Extract (Huangqi), Atractyloides Macrocephala Extract (Baizhu), Saposhnikovia Divaricata Extract (Dried Root), Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Reticulata Extract (Mandarin Orange), Hexylene Glyco, Peg-12 Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Allantoin, Honey Extract, Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate, Pentylene Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Triethanolamine, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Disodium Edta, Sodium Hyaluronate Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol.
Commonly Asked Questions
Q. What age can you start using retinol?
A. Most dermatologists recommend using retinol in your mid-twenties, as that is when collagen levels in the skin start decreasing more rapidly and you see your skin loosing its elasticity, dullness and have concerns like hyperpigmentation and uneven skin tone.

Q. What are the benefits of retinol for skin?
A. A synthetic derivative of vitamin A, retinol is found in most anti-aging skincare products. It is known to promote collagen production, helps to clear acne, smoothens fine lines, wrinkles and encourages cell turnover. It works well for most skin types!

Q. Do I need to moisturize my skin after using this serum?
A. Citrus Got Real Retinol Brightening Serum is loaded with moisturizing ingredients like honey, allantoin, citrus oil and licorice extracts. This unique blend targets wrinkles, open pores, pigmentation, uneven skin texture and at the same time makes skin soft and smooth. Perfect for night time skincare ritual, this brightening serum can be layered up with a nourishing eye cream and a moisturizer to seal in all goodness.

Title: Citrus Got Real Daily Moisturizer
Body:
It's glow time with this refreshingly lightweight, vitamin C infused SUGAR Citrus Got Real Daily Moisturizer that works effectively to give you a happy, radiant and healthy-looking complexion. For dull and tired skin that needs long-lasting hydration, this pH-balancing unique formula comes infused with the goodness of orange peel oil. A hero ingredient in our entire Citrus Got Real skincare range, orange peel oil is known for its incredible skin brightening properties and helps combat acne, dark spots and hyperpigmentation leaving skin brighter, glossy and even. Skin soothing ingredients like arginine, glycerine and castor oil work efficiently to hydrate, restore moisture loss and help in protecting your skin from free radical damage. This super nourishing, non-oily moisturizer absorbs quickly to soften, smoothen and improve the skin texture. It has a zesty citrus scent that will give you the perfect summertime feels!

Make this moisturizer a part of your daily CTM regimen - it makes your skin so dewy and supple, you won't even be tempted to use an IG filter. It's time that you flaunt radiant looking complexion that feels fresh, recharged and ready to take on the world.

How it works:

- A hydrating, vitamin-C-rich moisturizer that instantly delivers an energizing burst of moisture to skin
- It brightens skin, reduces the appearance of dark spots and blemishes for a flawless complexion
- Orange peel oil minimizes the effect of sun damage on skin
- Arginine enhances skin elasticity, keeps skin firm and repairs skin damage
- This rejuvenating formula retains skin moisture and balances pH levels for healthy and supple skin
- SUGAR Citrus Got Real range is 100% vegan, free from parabens, sulphates, mineral oil and absolutely cruelty-free

Key ingredients:

- Orange peel oil contains vitamin C, a powerful antioxidant and collagen booster. It brightens skin, minimizes the effect of sun damage and reduces dark spots and blemishes.

- Arginine is an amino acid naturally occurring in the skin and works by boosting collagen production, improves skin elasticity and intensely moisturizes skin.

- Glycerine acts as a humectant and emollient that improves skin texture and gives it a smooth, supple and nourished feel.

Title: Citrus Got Real Brightening Peel
Body:
Introducing a potent yet gentle at-home facial peel for brighter-looking, clear and spotless complexion! Powered by mandelic acid, orange peel oil and extracts, SUGAR Citrus Got Real Brightening Peel in a unique spray form instantly removes all impurities, dead skin, unclogs pores and increases cell renewal to reveal fresh, spotless and vibrant skin. One of the only Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) to work on the skin’s deeper layers, mandelic acid helps to lighten hyperpigmentation, boosts collagen production and makes skin firmer and smoother. Orange peel oil on other hand loaded with anti-microbial and antioxidant properties, soothes irritated skin, lightens spots and blemishes and adds a nice glow to your complexion.

If skin dullness, acne, blackheads and hyperpigmentation is your worry, use this multi-tasking skin brightening peel from the glow-boosting 'Citrus Got Real Skincare Range' to tackle all of your concerns in one go! A 100% vegan formula, this one controls excess oil, lightens sun tan and also minimizes the look of pores, fine lines and wrinkles. Unlike other harsh chemical peels, this exfoliating peel does not cause any irritation and works well for all skin types. It soothes, hydrates skin well and brightens complexion with regular use. Simply spray the formula on a clean, dry face and let it absorb. Start rubbing the product gently in circular motions and see the magic unfold! Citrus Got Real Brightening Peel removes all the dirt and grime and leaves you with baby-soft, smooth and radiant skin.

Features:

  • Gentle exfoliating peel that deep cleanses, unclogs pores and lifts away all impurities and dullness
  • Powered by mandelic acid which is an effective AHA (alpha hydroxy acid), it dissolves upper layer of dead skin and accelerates cell turnover revealing healthy, clear complexion
  • Orange peel oil in this formula soothes redness, inflammation and lightens spots and blemishes
  • This at-home exfoliating peeling spray targets skin concerns like open pores, wrinkles, congested skin, breakouts and pigmentation
  • This potent formula also smoothens away fine lines, wrinkles and gives you firmer-looking, rejuvenated complexion
  • 100% vegan and cruelty formula
  • Non-comedogenic, fragrance-free and dermatologically-tested skincare product
  • Gentle formula that suits all skin types

How to use
  • Spray the Brightening Peel to cleansed, dry skin at night. Let the product absorb for a few seconds. Then gently massage the product using your fingertips removing all dead skin. Rinse it off with lukewarm water and follow it up with a gentle moisturizer
  • Use 1-3 times a week for great results. A tingling sensation may occur when applied to the skin

Note: This product contains alpha-hydroxy acids (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun. Avoid sun exposure when using this product and use a sunscreen in your AM skincare routine!

Commonly Asked Questions
Q. Can I use this peeling gel everyday?
A. This brightening peel gel powered by mandelic acid and orange peel oil works great as an exfoliator and we recommend using it twice or thrice a week for great results. If you have sensitive skin, you can use it once in 15 days.

Q. How does mandelic acid benefit skin?
A. An alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) derived from bitter almonds, mandelic acid is great to treat acne, dullness and pigmentation. It is an effective anti-aging ingredient, that helps in strengthening collagen and improves skin elasticity. It lifts away all impurities, brightens and makes skin smoother and softer. Packed with anti-bacterial benefits, mandelic acid is also effective in controlling excess oil, treating breakouts and lightening spots and blemishes.

Q. How long should I leave this peeling gel after application?
A. This peeling gel gives effective results in just a few minutes! Start with spraying the formula on to clean skin and let it absorb for a few seconds. Now gently massage your face and you will see the product clumping with all the residue coming off. Wash it off with lukewarm water and see bright results instantly.

Q. I have dull, blotchy skin which is a bit dry on cheeks. Will this peel work for me?
A. Absolutely! Citrus Got Real Brightening Peel infused with deep exfoliating alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) 'mandelic acid' effectively peels to remove impurities, unclog pores and improve the skin texture. Infused with orange peel oil and Mandarin peel extracts, this gentle yet effective formula tackles blackheads, uneven skin tone, dullness and adds intense moisture and glow. We definitely recommend this as the peel won't dry out your skin and make your skin look brighter, smoother and softer. Make sure to apply a serum or a moisturizer post using this peel.

Formulated using bentonite clay, cica and tea leaf extracts, this light-weight bubble mask draws out impurities and leaves your skin soft and bouncy to the touch. It controls excess sebum production, prevents blackheads, minimizes pores and instantly refreshes skin!

Just apply a very thin layer on the face and it’ll immediately start foaming once it comes in contact with oxygen. This action gently exfoliates the skin, hydrates and brightens skin instantly. - Unique formula that bubbles when it comes in contact with oxygen
- The formula is 100% vegetarian, cruelty-free and free from parabens, alcohol and sulphates

Key Ingredients:
- Bentonite clay helps draw out dirt, impurities and toxins while balancing sebum production
- Hyaluronic acid delivers moisture to the skin and makes skin plump and dewy
- Shea butter and jojoba seed oil soothe and heal damaged skin

Ingredients

Commonly Asked Questions
Q. I have dry skin. Can I use the SUGAR Coffee Culture Hydrating Mist?
A. This face mist suits all skin types! It has betaine as one of ingredients that deeply nourishes along with sodium hyaluronate (A water-soluble salt that's derived from hyaluronic acid) that helps regulate moisture content, improves signs of aging and maintains a protective barrier, keeping your skin supple, smooth and hydrated. 

Q. What are the benefits of using a face mist in my daily skincare routine?
A. While all face mists hydrate and refresh skin, facial mists just like our caffeine infused face mist, tones, sets makeup, reduces signs of ageing and also improves skin texture with daily use. It also preps your skin for makeup application and adds a nice dewy glow! Use this face mist for on-the-go hydration or whenever your skin feels dull or tired, all throughout the day!

Q. Which is better, a facial mist or toner?
A. Both toners and face mists are hydrating skincare products infused with ingredients that help promote good skin texture. Toners packed with astringent properties help deep cleanse, remove excess oil, maintain your skin's pH balance and also shrink your pores. On the other hand, a face mist usually works like a toner but also additional nourishing oils to keep skin hydrated. It helps lock in the moisture, soothes skin irritation and redness. Toners are usually applied post cleansing and facial mists can be applied anytime of the day to keep your skin fresh. Facial mists can also be applied right over your makeup to help set your face for the day and at the same time infuse natural nutrients in to your skin!

Q. What is Arabica coffee and how does it benefit my skin?
A.  Extracted from beans of the coffee plant, Coffea Arabica Seed Extract is packed with antioxidants and has much more benefits for your skin than your regular coffee. It is known to boost collagen production, tighten pores and can prevent wrinkles too. Coffee bean extracts with caffeine goodness help boost circulation, smoothen fine lines, reduce puffiness and promote brighter, radiant skin. Ideal for dry, mature and aging skin, coffea arabica seed extract also contains tannins which offer beneficial astringent properties to help balance oily and combination skin!

Want plump, dewy-looking, nourished skin? Indulge in Aquaholic Hyaluronic Serum that contains sodium hyaluronate which is a water-soluble salt form of hyaluronic acid. A hydration holy-grail, sodium hyaluronate holds 1000 times its weight in water, penetrates the skin easily encouraging moisture retention, improves skin luminosity, texture and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

How it works:

- Free from alcohol, parabens, and sulphates
- 100% vegetarian and cruelty-free formula

Key ingredients:

- The hyaluronic acid acts as a humectant, pulling in moisture and sealing it into the skin
- Green tea soothes, acts as an antioxidant and helps maintain skin tone
- The jojoba oil moisturizes, helps regulate sebum production and increases collagen synthesis

FAQs

Q. Is hyaluronic acid good for all skin types?
A. Hyaluronic acid is great for all skin types! While it is specifically recommended for people with dry, mature skin, everyone can reap the benefits by indulging their skin in some hydration!

Q. When can I use this serum in my skincare routine?

Moreover, this cleansing balm is also enriched with hydrating olive oil, which is a great source of antioxidants and fatty acids that help deliver intense nourishment to your skin.

Perfect for on-the-move cleansing, the Coffee Culture Cleansing Balm Stick with its unique solid balm formula melts gently onto damp skin and effortlessly breaks down long-wear makeup, deep exfoliates and cleanses skin in just a few swipes! It has emollient rich cupuacu butter, natural oils along with skin-loving ingredients like cica and hydrating aloe vera that target concerns like dark spots, dullness and pigmentation. Swipe on this beauty when you are too lazy to indulge in a double-cleansing routine. Simply rub it on damp skin and you will see all the dirt and grime coming off! 
Follow it up with a water-based cleanser or a face wash, and your skin is ready to glow!

  • This daily use cleansing balm stick glides onto the skin and breaks down makeup and helps get rid of dirt and impurities

Ingredients

Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Butter (Cupuacu butter), Magnesium Stearate, PEG-7 Glycerol Cocoate, Laureth-4, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Organic Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba Oil), Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit, Oil, Coffee Arabica (Coffee Seed Oil), Caffeine, d- Alpha Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond Oil), Hydrogenated Castor Oil

Commonly asked questions
Q. What is a cleansing balm?
A. A cleansing balm is essentially what it sounds like—a thick, rich balm that can be used to cleanse your skin of dirt, oil, makeup and impurities. This type of face cleanser is formulated with natural oils. If you go back to your school days, you may remember the phrase “like attracts like”—which is exactly how face cleansing balms work. The oils in the formula not only rid your skin of all that build-up, but they also help restore moisture, leaving your skin clean, hydrated and intensely nourished. This is a huge factor in why they’re a popular option for dry, sensitive, and mature skin types as they supply the skin with ample nourishment and remove all dirt and makeup too.

Q. Do cleansing balms work for all skin types?
A. Cleansing balms are so skin friendly that they work for all skin types and concerns. They work especially well for those with dry, dehydrated, and even sensitive skin conditions. They’re also great for oily skin as oil breaks down oil, essentially regulating your sebum production, making your skin less oily with regular use.
Q. Can I use the SUGAR Coffee Culture Cleansing Balm Stick as a makeup remover?
A. Yes, you can! Cleansing balms are the best makeup removers because most makeup products are oil-based and are designed for long wear! The nourishing oils in this cleansing balm break down these oils in your makeup, making removal of dirt, makeup, and debris easy-peasy. Just one use will reveal softer, smoother, hydrated skin!

Q. Should I use a cleansing balm if I don't wear makeup?
A. You definitely can! Even if you don't wear makeup, you do need an oil-based face cleanser to melt away sebum, pollutants and dirt from your skin. Water-based face washes and cleansers do not properly remove these impurities, so having an oil cleanser (in the form of cleansing balm) to start off your routine is a great option!

Title: Cheat Sheet Pore Care Mask (Pack of 6)
Body:
It’s time to put your hands together for none other than the luxurious, the lavish, the grand SUGAR Sheet Mask. Packed individually with enriched formulas that help detoxify, cleanse, hydrate, vitalize & brighten your skin; this serum-soaked mask is the quick fix you need at any downtime. Be it a work night, weekend, before stepping out or when you are watching TV, reading a book or even when you’re doing your hair, this is a great way to enjoy the ultimate at-home spa experience.


Benefit: SUGAR Cheat Sheet Pore Care Mask helps maintain skin elasticity & cellular balance along with rejuvenating, hydrating & tightening it too. Green caviar minimizes wrinkles & increases firmness, aloe extract gives a calming effect & super x-rice bran strengthens skin barrier for protection. The antioxidant-rich cucumber pulp soothes damaged skin. You’ll go ‘wow’!

How To Use: Wash your face and use a skin toner. Remove the mask from the pouch and gently unfold. Separate the mask from the protecting plastic and carefully place over the eye area first and then smoothen out across the rest of your face. Keep the mask on for 15-20 minutes. Gently remove and tap the excess serum into your skin for better absorption.

Title: Power Clay Peel Off Mask
Body:
It's about time you pick your play as SUGAR Power Clay Peel Off Mask makes its entry into the sensational SUGAR tribe. 

This mask delivers cleansing, oil-absorbing and skin-toning perks. Packed with mineral-rich Kaolin Clay that acts as a purifier and exfoliator to yield smoother skin, this easy-to-peel off mask gives your skin a healthy glow in short time.

Benefits: SUGAR Power Clay Peel Off Mask contains activated carbon that absorbs excess sebum, deep cleans the skin plus removes blackheads. Kaolin Clay also rejuvenates the cells, improves blood circulation and removes toxins from skin. It is vegan, suits all skin types and can be used by men and women.

How to Use: Apply an even layer to clean, dry face. Leave on for 15-20 minutes until dry. Gently peel off mask from outer edges. Rinse with warm water. Use twice or thrice a week for a naturally glowing skin. Avoid contact with eyes.

Net Volume: 50 ml

Title: Swipe Right Hand Rub
Body:
It’s time to bid adieu to germs & bacteria and get clean, fresh hands!

SUGAR Swipe Right Hand Rub is here to help stop germs in their tracks without compromising the softness of your hands. This gel-based hand sanitizer formula is formulated with 70% alcohol along with effective anti-bacterial ingredients that keep hands sanitized and kills up to 99.9% germs instantly, without water. This hand sanitizer also softens and moisturizes your hands, thanks to its deeply beneficial skin soothing ingredients like glycerine and argan oil. Its lightweight, non-greasy gel-based formula absorbs into your skin without leaving any residue and ensures your skin’s moisture stays intact.

In a time where sanitizing one’s hands comes second only to breathing, the SUGAR Swipe Right Hand Rub sanitizer will be your lifesaver – turning a mundane and necessary habit into a self-care ritual that’s sure to put a smile on your face with every use!

Choose from the 4 SUGAR Swipe Right Hand Rub variants, that helps remove germs from your hand to keep you safe from all kind of infections whether you’re indoor or outdoor!

SUGAR Swipe Right Hand Rub is available in 4 enriching fragrances:

- 01 Roaring Rose: A sweet, floral-fresh fragrance blend with a terrific twist!
- 02 Bold Berry: A fragrance-fusion of sweet, summer berries.
- 03 Lush Lavender: A modern twist to calming, luxurious lavender fragrance.
- 04 Very Vanilla: Give a warm, whipped edge to dreamy, sweet vanilla scent.

Net Volume: 120ml

Maximum Retail Price: Rs.149

Country of Origin: India
Company Name: SAGE COSMETIC LLP
Company Address: C-415, TTC Industrial Area, Turbhe, Navi Mumbai 400701

Ingredients:

- SUGAR Swipe Right Hand Rub (01 ROARING ROSE): Denatured Alcohol 70%, Deionised Water 23%, IPA 3%, Glycerine 1%, Argan oil 1%, Tocopheryl Acetate 1%, Propylene Glycol 0.5%, Fragrance 0.5%, D & C color

- SUGAR Swipe Right Hand Rub (02 BOLD BERRY): Denatured Alcohol 70%, Deionised Water 23%, IPA 3%, Glycerine 1%, Argan oil 1%, Tocopheryl Acetate 1%, Propylene Glycol 0.5%, Fragrance 0.5%, C.I. 45430

- SUGAR Swipe Right Hand Rub (03 LUSH LAVENDER): Denatured Alcohol 70%, Deionised Water 23%, IPA 3%, Glycerine 1%, Argan oil 1%, Tocopheryl Acetate 1%, Propylene Glycol 0.5%, Fragrance 0.5%, C.I. 60730

- SUGAR Swipe Right Hand Rub (04 VERY VANILLA): Denatured Alcohol 70%, Deionised Water 23%, IPA 3%, Glycerine 1%, Argan oil 1%, Tocopheryl Acetate 1%, Propylene Glycol 0.5%, Fragrance 0.5%

How to Use

Take a thumb-sized amount on your palm in a cupped hand, covering all surfaces and rub hands palm to palm.
Make sure the hand rub reaches every corner of your palms, fingers and back of the palms.
After applying the hand sanitizer, let your hands dry.
Do not wash or wipe off with water, paper towels, cloth, etc.
Use while travelling, at home, office, when touched an infectious surface, etc.

Precautions: For external use only.

Benefits
- Contains 70% denatured alcohol that helps effectively eliminate germs and keeps your hands clean and fresh
- Kills up to 99.9% of germs without soap or water
- Gentle, non-irritating and skin-friendly formula, enriched with argan oil and glycerine
- Convenient to carry away with you anywhere, anytime
- Keeps you and your family protected, anywhere and anytime
- Free from paraben, phthalate, sulfate and silicone, artificial colours and fragrances
- Cruelty-free formula

 

Commonly asked questions
Q. Can I use this Hand Rub with water?
A. There is no need of water. Take a few drops of this gel, spread all over the hands and fingers and rub it gently for at least 20 seconds or until it dries completely.

Q. What is the texture like?
A. The SUGAR Swipe Right Hand Rub has a refreshing, gel-based formula that is non-sticky & non-greasy.

Q. Is it safe for hands?
A. Yes. The formula is gentle, completely safe to use and free from SLS, SLES, Parabens, MEA, DEA, TEA, Petrolatum, Phthalates, Ethoxylates, Artificial Fragrances & Silicones.

Q. What is the volume of product in each bottle?
A. The volume of product in each bottle is 120ml.

Title: Aquaholic Hydrating Primer
Body:
Add a boost of hydration and glow with the SUGAR Aquaholic Hydrating Primer. An essential for smooth and flawless makeup application, this gel-based, refreshing face primer moisturizes, soothes and preps skin well. Infused with the goodness of peppermint leaf and rose water along with glycerin, this lightweight, non-comedogenic formula smoothens out the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and prevents makeup melt. Plus, this formula is non-sticky and glides on like a dream, leaving skin silky smooth. The unique gel formula absorbs quickly but has the benefits of a moisturizing cream. Wear it as a moisturizer or as a primer under makeup to keep your skin soft, supple and fresher-looking. The best part is that it works for all skin types!

How it works:

- This face primer instantly cools down your skin while hydrating and prepping it for flawless makeup application
- Gives you refreshed, moisturized skin that looks and feels great all day long
- Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
- Infused with skin calming ingredients like peppermint leaf and rose water
- Hyaluronic-based formula makes skin look dewy and plump all day on
- Malachite extracts work as an antioxidant and keep skin protected against the effects of environmental aggressors like UV, pollution and sun damage
- It is suitable for acne-prone, pigmented and even sensitive skin
- Free from alcohol, parabens and sulphates, 100% vegetarian and cruelty-free formula

Key ingredients:

- Hyaluronic acid acts as a humectant, making your skin plump and hydrated
- Purslne is an anti-ageing hero that reduces inflammation, promotes collagen and helps calm and soothe skin
- Niacinamide brightens and smoothes skin and works to protect it from environmental damage
- Malachite extracts deep cleanses and purifies the skin. It improves skin texture and reduces the appearance of wrinkles

Maximum Retail Price: Rs. 699

Net Weight: 50 ml

Company Name: SUGAR Cosmetics LLC

Company Address: 8 The Green, Suite A, Dover, DE 1990

Country of Origin: PRC

Dive into intense hydration and add a long-lasting glow to your skin with the Aquaholic Skincare range. Check out the entire range here. 

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Propanediol, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Malachite Extract, Sodium Carbomer, PEG-9 Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Water, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance, Sodium Hyaluronate

How to apply

Wear it alone by itself, or wear it under makeup – your choice!

- Apply to clean skin prior to makeup application to prep skin
- Use a small amount and blend evenly on your face
- Allow it to absorb before applying makeup

Beauty tips: Prep, prime and hydrate your skin using the Hyaluronic Serum and Hydrating Primer. Brighten up with the Pore Exfoliating Scrub and the Cleansing Mask. Tackle spots, acne, soothe and calm irritated skin using the Clarifying Spot Gel!

Commonly asked questions

Q. Should I use a primer before or after moisturiser?
A. Primer is an essential in your makeup routine. It comes in varying forms for different skin concerns and skin types and ensures that your makeup applies evenly and stays throughout the day. While a hydrating primer will be an additional dose of moisture for your skin, it cannot be a substitute for a moisturiser. Start with a clean face, follow it up with a moisturizer and let it absorb before applying sunscreen, primer and makeup.

Q. What does this Aquaholic Hydrating Primer do?
A. Infused with hyaluronic acid, refreshing peppermint and rose water, this intensely hydrating face primer refreshes, preps skin well and adds a nice glow. It keeps your skin supple, dewy, refines pores and prevents skin dryness or flaking. Wear it under any bb cream, foundation or alone for a fresh face look!
